Цель {@condition charmed} подчиняется произнесенным командам камбиона. Если цель получает какой-либо вред от камбиона или другого существа или получает от камбиона самоубийственную команду, цель может повторить бросок спасброска, завершив эффект на себя в случае успеха. Если бросок спасброска цели успешен или если эффект заканчивается для нее, существо становится невосприимчивым к Зловещим чарам камбиона на следующие 24 часа.

reaction.name: Hellish Rebuke (1st level spell)
entries: В качестве реакции на урон от существа камбион может заставить атакующего преуспеть в {@dc 14} броске спасброска на ловкость или получить 11 ({@damage 2d10}) урона огнем, или вдвое меньше при успехе.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: Баргест может использовать бонусное действие для полиморфирования в малого гоблина или обратно в свою истинную форму. Кроме размера и скорости, его статистика в каждой форме одинакова. Любое снаряжение, которое он носит или несет, не трансформируется. Баргест возвращается в свою истинную форму, если умирает.

trait.name: Fire Banishment
entries: Баргест рассматривает любые участки открытого пламени шириной не менее 10 футов как односторонние порталы в Геенну. Баргест, который начинает свой ход в горящей области, должен успешно пройти {@dc 15} бросок спасброска по харизме или быть втянутым через него.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: Если баргест движется прямо к существу на расстояние не менее 20 футов, а затем в тот же ход наносит ему удар когтями, цель должна успешно выполнить бросок на спасбросок силы {@dc 14} или быть сбита с ног {@condition prone}. Если цель составляет {@condition prone}, баргест может нанести ей одну атаку укусом в качестве бонусного действия.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Баргест делает две атаки когтями и использует свой телепорт.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) колющего урона.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} попадание, досягаемость 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) колющего урона. Вместо нанесения урона баргест может схватить цель (побег {@dc 14}).

action.name: Worry
entries: Одно существо {@condition grappled}, находящееся рядом с баргестом и хотя бы одним из союзников баргеста, должно успешно выполнить бросок спасброска на {@dc 14} конституцию или получить 35 ({@damage 10d6}) колющих повреждений, или вдвое меньше при успехе.

action.name: Teleport (spell, 4th level)
entries: Баргест и до одного существа, которое едет на нем или {@condition grappled} на нем, магически телепортируются на расстояние до 60 футов в незанятое пространство, которое он может видеть.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Ягнолот имеет преимущество в бросках спасения против заклинаний и других магических эффектов.

trait.name: Venal Nature
entries: Юголот всегда готов принять взятку, вместо того чтобы сражаться. Обычно ягнолот принимает взятку в размере своего рейтинга вызова, умноженного на 25 gp, или вдвое меньше, если существо готово пообещать будущую услугу.

trait.name: Electrified Flesh
entries: Существо, поразившее юголота атакой ближнего боя, не может использовать реакцию до начала своего следующего хода.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ягнолот использует два своих действия. Он не может использовать одно и то же действие дважды за ход.

action.name: Battlefield Cunning
entries: Один союзный юголот в радиусе 60 футов от ягнолота, который слышит его, может использовать свою реакцию, чтобы сделать одну атаку ближнего боя.

action.name: Lightning Bolt (3rd level spell)
entries: Существа на линии длиной 100 футов и шириной 5 футов должны успешно выполнить бросок на ловкость {@dc 16} или получить 28 ({@damage 8d6}) урона молнией, или вдвое меньше при успехе.

action.name: Massive Arm
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} попадание, радиус действия 15 футов, одна цель. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d12 + 4}) урон от удара и цель отталкивается на 10 футов. Если цель - существо, оно должно успешно выполнить бросок на спасение по конституции {@dc 16} или будет сбито с ног {@condition prone} и не сможет стоять до конца следующего хода ягнолота.

action.name: Teleport (3rd level spell)
entries: Ягнолот магически телепортируется на расстояние до 60 футов в незанятое пространство, которое он может видеть.

reaction.name: Dark Escape
entries: В качестве реакции на получение 20 или более повреждений от одного источника, ягнолот может окутать себя облаком магической тьмы радиусом 20 футов до конца своего следующего хода.

reaction.name: Steal Life
entries: В качестве реакции на прохождение броска спасброска против заклинания ягнолот может заставить заклинателя сделать {@dc 16} бросок спасброска по харизме. Если спасбросок провален, заклинатель телепортируется на расстояние 5 футов от ягнолота, получает 27 ({@damage 6d8}) некротических повреждений и тратит два кубика хита. Если заклинатель не может этого сделать, то вместо этого он падает на 0 HP.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Ягнолот имеет преимущество в бросках спасения против заклинаний и других магических эффектов.

trait.name: Venal Nature
entries: Юголот всегда готов принять взятку, вместо того чтобы сражаться. Обычно ойнолот принимает взятку в размере своего рейтинга вызова, умноженного на 25 gp, или вдвое меньше, если существо готово пообещать будущую услугу.

trait.name: Bringer of Plagues
entries: Ойнолот невосприимчив к эффектам болезни. Существо, которое начинает свой ход в радиусе 30 футов от ойнолота, должно успешно выполнить бросок спасброска на {@dc 18} конституцию или быть зараженным {@disease wastegash|ConfC}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ойнолот делает две атаки когтями и использует телепорт или фиксирующий взгляд, если есть.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) косых повреждений плюс 22 ({@damage 4d10}) некротических повреждений.

action.name: Teleport (spell, 3rd level)
entries: Ягнолот магически телепортируется на расстояние до 60 футов в незанятое пространство, которое он может видеть.

action.name: Transfixing Gaze {@recharge 5}
entries: Одно существо в радиусе 60 футов, зараженное вастеротом, должно успешно выполнить бросок спасброска {@dc 18} мудрости или быть {@condition charmed} ойнолотом в течение следующей минуты, или пока его болезнь не будет излечена. Пока {@condition charmed} цель находится в таком состоянии, она изо всех сил старается следовать командам ойнолота и повторяет это спасбросок всякий раз, когда получает урон, прекращая эффект при успехе.

action.name: Wall of Vermin (1/Day)
entries: Ойнолот вызывает стену из извивающихся паразитов на твердой поверхности, которую он может видеть в радиусе 60 футов от себя. Стена считается сложным террейном, имеет толщину 5 футов и состоит из шести непрерывных сегментов длиной до 10 футов и высотой до 10 футов. Существо, которое начинает свой ход в стене или входит в нее впервые за ход, должно успешно пройти бросок спасброска на {@dc 18} конституцию или получить 23 ({@damage 5d8}) колющих повреждений, или вдвое меньше при успехе. Существо, провалившее это спасбросок на 5 или более баллов, заражается {@disease filth fever|ConfC}.

reaction.name: Dark Escape
entries: В качестве реакции на получение 20 или более повреждений от одного источника ойнолот может окутать себя облаком магической тьмы радиусом 20 футов до конца своего следующего хода.

reaction.name: Corrupted Healing
entries: В качестве реакции на то, что существо в радиусе 30 футов получает магическое исцеление, ойнолот заставляет его сделать {@dc 18} бросок на спасение по конституции. Существо, зараженное болезнью, делает это спасбросок с недостатком. В случае неудачи существо получает уязвимость ко всем повреждениям на следующую минуту и повторяет это спасбросок в конце каждого своего хода, прекращая эффект в случае успеха.

trait.name: Venal Nature
entries: Юголот всегда готов принять взятку, вместо того чтобы сражаться. Обычно юголот принимает взятку в размере рейтинга вызова юголота, умноженного на 25 gp, хотя может принять и меньше.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Никалот не может быть затронут или обнаружен заклинаниями 3-го уровня или ниже, если он сам этого не пожелает. У него есть преимущество при бросках на спасение против всех других заклинаний и магических эффектов.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Атаки оружием никалота являются магическими.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Никалот делает атаку когтями и использует свой телепорт, или делает атаку большой секирой и использует свою невидимость.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) косых повреждений. Если цель - существо, оно должно успешно пройти спасбросок на {@dc 16} конституцию или потерять половину текущего HP. Существо, провалившее это спасбросок, повторяет его в конце каждого своего хода, прекращая эффект в случае успеха или теряя половину текущего HP в случае неудачи.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} попадание, досягаемость 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) косой урон, цель получает {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: Nycaloth магически поворачивается {@condition invisible}, пока не атакует или пока не закончится его концентрация (как при концентрации на заклинании).

action.name: Teleport
entries: Никалот магически телепортируется вместе с любыми существами, которых он хватает, на расстояние до 60 футов в незанятое пространство, которое он может видеть.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Меццолот имеет преимущество при бросках спасения против заклинаний и других магических эффектов.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Оружейные атаки мезолота являются магическими.

trait.name: Venal Nature
entries: Юголот всегда готов принять взятку, вместо того чтобы сражаться. Обычно юголот принимает взятку в размере рейтинга вызова юголота, умноженного на 25 gp, хотя может принять и меньше.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Мезолот делает четыре атаки: одну своей ядовитой слюной и три - своим трезубцем.

action.name: Dweomerend Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) колющего урона, и у цели рассеиваются любые заклинания четвертого уровня или ниже. Если заклинание рассеивается таким образом, цель получает дополнительный {@damage 1d8} урон силой за уровень заклинания.

action.name: Toxic Spittle {@recharge 5}
entries: Целевое существо в радиусе 15 футов должно сделать {@dc 15} бросок на спасение конституции или получить 23 ({@damage 5d8}) урона ядом и быть {@condition blinded} до конца своего следующего хода.

action.name: Teleport (3rd level spell)
entries: Мезолот магически телепортируется вместе со всем снаряжением, которое он носит или несет, на расстояние до 60 футов в незанятое пространство, которое он может видеть.

reaction.name: Legendary Reactions
entries: Меццолот может сделать легендарную реакцию, когда выполняются ее условия, без использования своей реакции.

reaction.name: Dark Escape
entries: В качестве реакции на получение 15 или более повреждений от одного источника, мезолот может окутать себя облаком магической тьмы радиусом 20 футов до конца своего следующего хода.

reaction.name: Trident Trip
entries: В качестве реакции на то, что существо промахивается по нему атакой ближнего боя, мезолот может заставить его сделать {@dc 16} бросок на ловкость или быть сбитым с ног {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Swift Vengeance
entries: As a reaction to passing a saving throw against a spell, the mezzoloth teleports up to 60 feet. If it ends this teleportation within 5 feet of the spellcaster, the mezzoloth may make an attack with its trident.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Меццолот имеет преимущество при бросках спасения против заклинаний и других магических эффектов.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Оружейные атаки мезолота являются магическими.

trait.name: Venal Nature
entries: Юголот всегда готов принять взятку, вместо того чтобы сражаться. Обычно юголот принимает взятку в размере рейтинга вызова юголота, умноженного на 25 gp, хотя может принять и меньше.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mezzoloth makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its trident. It may replace its claw attack with a use of its Toxic Spittle ability.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) косой урон.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage when held with two claws and used to make a melee attack.

action.name: Toxic Spittle {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 15 feet must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or take 23 ({@damage 5d8}) poison damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Teleport (3rd level spell)
entries: Мезолот магически телепортируется вместе со всем снаряжением, которое он носит или несет, на расстояние до 60 футов в незанятое пространство, которое он может видеть.

reaction.name: Dark Escape
entries: As a reaction to taking 20 or more damage from a single source, the Mezzoloth may shroud itself in a 20 foot radius cloud of magical darkness until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The merrenoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Venal Nature
entries: The merrenoloth charges a rate of 100 gp per passenger for passage on its boat, or 1000 gp for a passenger that has wronged it or another merrenoloth.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The merrenoloth makes two attacks with its oar and uses its Fear Gaze.

action.name: Oar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Drowning Gaze
entries: The merrenoloth targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the merrenoloth for 1 minute. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature cannot swim or hold its breath. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reaction.name: Teleport
entries: As a reaction to taking damage, the merrenoloth magically teleports, along with its boat and whichever occupants of the boat it chooses, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hydroloth can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hydroloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Adaptive Combat
entries: The hydroloth treats its AC as 20 against attacks made by creatures affected by its Steal Memories.

trait.name: Secure Memory
entries: The hydroloth is immune to the waters of the River Styx as well as any effect that would steal or modify its memories or detect or read its thoughts.

trait.name: Venal Nature
entries: The yugoloth is always willing to accept a bribe rather than fight. A yugoloth will usually accept a rate of its challenge rating times 25 gp.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hydroloth attacks twice with its claws and uses its Steal Memories, if available. It may replace either or both of its claw attacks with its Deepest Fears or Teleport abilities.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Deepest Fears
entries: One creature affected by the hydroloth's Steal Memories has a manifestation of its deepest fears appear to it for the next minute. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Psychic damage and be {@condition frightened} for the duration. A creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a succcess or taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage on a failure.

action.name: Steal Memories {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature the hydroloth can see within 60 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw or have its proficiency bonus reduced by 1 until it completes a long rest. A creature that has its proficiency bonus reduced to 0 in this way can't speak or cast spells.

action.name: Teleport (3rd level spell)
entries: The hydroloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reaction.name: Shared Mind
entries: As a reaction to failing an Intelligence or Wisdom saving throw, the hydroloth may force a creature within 60 feet that is affected by its Steal Memory to succeed on a {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw or suffering the triggering saving throw's effects as well.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dhergoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Confusing Anatomy
entries: A creature gains no benefit from flanking the dhergoloth. If the dhergoloth falls {@condition prone}, it must spend its action to stand up.

trait.name: Gyroscopic
entries: If the dhergoloth makes four or more claw attacks in a turn, it has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Venal Nature
entries: The yugoloth is always willing to accept a bribe rather than fight. A dhergoloth will usually accept a rate of its challenge rating times 25 gp, or half as much from a creature proficient in Intimidation.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dhergoloth makes three flailing claw attacks, plus an additional flailing claw attack for each successive turn it uses this ability, to a maximum of six. If it makes five or more flailing claw attacks in a turn, it also uses its Shriek.

action.name: Flailing Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) косой урон.

action.name: Shriek
entries: Each creature within 15 feet of the Dhergoloth must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of it until the end of the Dhergoloth's next turn.

action.name: Teleport (3rd level spell)
entries: The dhergoloth magically teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reaction.name: Dark Escape
entries: As a reaction to taking 20 or more damage from a single source, the Dhergoloth may shroud itself in a 20 foot radius cloud of magical darkness until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Dimensional Lock
entries: Other creatures can't teleport to or from a space within 60 feet of the canoloth. Any attempt to do so is wasted. Creatures in the area have resistance to Force damage.

trait.name: Outsize Strength
entries: While grappling, dragging, or being ridden by another creature, the canoloth is considered to be Large.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The canoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Barbed Tongue
entries: A creature that starts its turn {@condition grappled} by the canoloth takes 13 ({@damage 2d12}) piercing damage. The tongue can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points). Destroying the tongue deals no damage to the canoloth, which can extrude more tongue on its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The canoloth makes two attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 6d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}), and is {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The canoloth can grapple one target at a time with its tongue.

reaction.name: Reel
entries: As a reaction to a creature damaging its tongue or failing an attempt to escape its grapple, the canoloth may force a creature {@condition grappled} by it to succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and pulled 30 feet towards the canoloth.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The arcanaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Venal Nature
entries: Юголот всегда готов принять взятку, вместо того чтобы сражаться. Обычно юголот принимает взятку в размере рейтинга вызова юголота, умноженного на 25 gp, хотя может принять и меньше.

trait.name: Spell Trader
entries: The arcanaloth knows all wizard spells of 8th level or lower. If it fears it will lose a fight, it may offer to teach a creature with a spellbook one spell in exchange for mercy.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The arcanaloth uses its arcane insight once and its magic barrage twice. It may replace one use of its magic barrage with a use of its Steal Spell, if available.

action.name: Arcane Insight
entries: One creature within 60 ft. must make a {@dc 17} Charisma Saving Throw. On a failure, the Arcanaloth discovers what spells the target has prepared and what unexpended spell slots they have.

action.name: Magic Barrage
entries: The arcanaloth unleashes a swarm of magical missiles that strike a creature within 120 feet, dealing 27 ({@damage 5d8 + 5}) force damage. A creature may halve this damage with the {@spell Shield} spell.

action.name: Steal Spell {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 60 feet must make a {@dc 17} Charisma save. On a failed save, the Arcanaloth casts a spell the creature has prepared, expending one of the creature's spell slots to do so. For the next minute, the creature cannot cast that spell.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage. The target must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Invisibility (2nd level spell)
entries: The Arcanaloth becomes {@condition invisible} until it takes another action.

reaction.name: Trickster's Escape
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with an attack or spell, the Arcanaloth may force a small or medium creature within 60 feet to succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or switch places with the arcanaloth, becoming the new target.

reaction.name: Shield (1st level spell)
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack, the Arcanaloth increases its AC by 5, including against the triggering attack, until the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Counterspell (3rd level spell)
entries: As a reaction to seeing a creature within 60 feet cast a spell, the yugoloth may attempt to disrupt it, making an Intelligence ability check with DC equal to 10+ the spells level. This check succeeds automatically if the spell is 3rd level or below.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The devil doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Limited Spines
entries: The devil has twelve tail spines. Used spines regrow by the time the devil finishes a long rest. If the devil has no spines remaining, it may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes two attacks with its tail spines.

action.name: Fork
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail Spine
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20/80 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage and the spine embeds in the target's flesh. The target's speed is reduced by 5 ft. for each spine embedded in it. The spines may be removed as an action with a successful DC12 medicine check, or by taking an additional {@damage 1d6} damage per spine removed.

action.name: Detonate Spines
entries: Each creature with one or more of the devil's spines lodged in it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage per spine, after which the spines crumble to ash.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: Any creature hostile to the pit fiend that starts its turn within 20 feet of the pit fiend must make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw, unless the pit fiend is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the pit fiend's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The pit fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The pit fiend's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Heart Crusher
entries: The pit fiend's attacks score a critical on a roll of  16-20 against a {@condition frightened} creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pit fiend makes four attacks: one with its bite, one with its claw, one with its mace, and one with its tail. It may replace its bite attack with a use of its irresistable command.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target can't regain hit points, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The {@condition poisoned} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage plus 21 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and the target is knocked back 10 feet.

action.name: Irresistable Command
entries: The pit fiend forces one friendly devil of CR 19 or below to move up to 25 feet and then explode. Each creature within 20 feet of the devil must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage, or half as much on a success. The devil that explodes is killed.

reaction.name: Call the Legions
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 150 HP, the Pit Fiend summons four Merregons. A summoned devil appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner and remains for 1 minute or until it or its summoner dies. Each creature adjacent to a summoned devil when it appears must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 23 ({@damage 5d8}) fire damage, or half as much on a success.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that arent silvered

trait.name: Cloud of Vermin
entries: A non-devil creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the nupperibo must succeed on a DC11 Constitution saving throw or take 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage and be infected with {@disease pthisis|ConfC}. A creature within the areas of two or more nupperibos makes the saving throw with disadvantage.

trait.name: Scent-Reliant
entries: The nupperibo is blind in the presence of an overpowering scent, such as that produced by the {@spell Stinking Cloud} spell.

trait.name: Weak-Minded
entries: The nupperibo follows the most recent telepathic command it was given, if it understands it.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) колющего урона.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that arent silvered

trait.name: Infernal Tack
entries: The Narzugon may mount any willing Large or larger creature. While riding a creature, the narzugon acts on its mount's initiative, rather than rolling its own.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The narzugon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Aura of Relentless Command
entries: A devil that starts its turn within 60 feet of the narzugon makes saving throws to end an ongoing effect at the beginning of its turn, rather than at the end.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The narzugon uses either its Compel Honor or Abjure the Unforsaken, then makes three attacks with its hellfire lance.

action.name: Hellfire Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5}) piercing damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage. If this damage kills a creature, the creature's soul rises from the River Styx as a lemure in Avernus in {@dice 1d4} hours.

action.name: Compel Honor
entries: One creature within 60 feet of the narzugon that can hear it must must succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or be cursed to face it in melee combat. An affected creature that attempts to target the narzugon with an attack or harmful spell from more than 10 feet away must first make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell.

action.name: Abjure the Unforsaken
entries: One non-fiend creature within 60 feet of the narzugon that can hear it must must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn. While {@condition frightened} in this way, the creature must spend its turn trying to move as far from the narzugon as it can.

action.name: Channel Death {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}90 ({@damage 20d8}) necrotic damage.

reaction.name: Punish Falsity
entries: As a reaction to a creature succeeding on a saving throw against the narzugon's Compel Honor ability, the narzugon and its mount may move up to it's (or its mount's) speed toward the creature. If it ends this movement within 10 ft. of the creature, the narzugon may make a hellfire lance attack.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that arent silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the merregon's darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The merregon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Trudging Advance
entries: The merregon acts on initiative count 5, instead of rolling initiative. Creatures with this trait share a turn, taking their actions and movement in any order.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The merregon makes two halberd attacks, or if an allied fiend of challenge rating 6 or higher is within 60 feet of it, the merregon makes three halberd attacks. It may replace one of its halberd attacks with a use of its Steal Face, if available.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Steal Face {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 60 feet must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution save or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) necrotic damage, or half as much on a success. A creature reduced to 0 HP by this damage has its face stolen by the merregon, as its features melt off and slide away leaving only blank flesh behind until cured with a Greater Restoration or equivalent magic. A faceless creature can still breath and speak, though it is difficult to tell how.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The imp can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a rat (speed 20 ft.), a raven (20 ft., fly 60 ft.), or a spider (20 ft., climb 20 ft.), or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the speed changes noted. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the imp's darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The imp has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Sting (Bite in Beast Form)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Phlegmatic Imbalance {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 30 feet  must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be slowed. An affected creature's speed is halved, it takes a -2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can't use reactions. On its turn, it can use either an action or a bonus action, not both. Regardless of the creature's abilities or magic items, it can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The imp magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the imp wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The imp can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a rat (speed 20 ft.), a raven (20 ft., fly 60 ft.), or a spider (20 ft., climb 20 ft.), or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the speed changes noted. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the imp's darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The imp has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Sting (Bite in Beast Form)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Melancholic Imbalance {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 30 feet  must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the imp's next turn. This effect ends early if the affected creature takes damage.

action.name: Sanguine Imbalance {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 30 feet  must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or fall {@condition prone}, becoming {@condition incapacitated} and unable to stand up for the duration as it is overcome with fits of uncontrolable laughter. At the end of each of its turns, and each time it takes damage, the target can repeat this save, ending the effect on a success.

While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target becomes indifferent to hostile creatures. A {@condition poisoned} creature may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Diabolical Stench {@recharge 5}
entries: The imp emits an {@condition invisible} cloud of sickening gas. Creatures within 5 feet of the imp must make a {@dc 11} or be {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, it takes {@damage 1d6} poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A {@condition poisoned} creature may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success, or may end the effect early by using its action to retch.

action.name: Choleric Imbalance {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 12} Charisma saving  throw or be cursed. Whenever a cursed creature takes damage, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or go into a berserker rage. While raging, the cursed creature must use its action to make a melee attack against the last creature to damage it, or to dash towards it. A creature may repeat this Wisdom save at the end of each of its turns, regaining control over itself on a success.

action.name: Wounding Curse {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 12} Charisma saving throw or be cursed. Whenever a cursed creature takes damage, it takes {@damage 1d4} additional damage of the same type.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The imp magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the imp wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Ice Strider
entries: The devil can tunnel through ice without slowing. The devil is not slowed by difficult terrain due to ice or snow. If it starts its turn in difficult terrain caused by ice or snow, the devil may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Layered Carapace
entries: The Ice Devil can't take more than 30 damage in a single turn. If it takes 30 damage in a single turn, its AC takes a cumulative minus 2 penalty until it completes a long rest.

trait.name: Crippling Cold
entries: The devil is surrounded by an 15 ft. radius aura of magical cold. When a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage, or half as much damage on a success. If the Ice Devil does not move on its turn, the affected area is covered in slick ice and becomes difficult terrain. If the devil takes fire damage, this trait ceases to function until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes three attacks with its spear and uses its Ice Wall twice. If all three of its attacks hit the same creature, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the devil's next turn.

action.name: Barbed Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) cold damage.

action.name: Ice Wall
entries: The devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 10 feet long and 10 feet high. When the wall appears, creatures in its space are pushed to a side of their choice.
The wall can be damaged and breached; each 10-foot section has AC 5, 30 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to acid, cold, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage.

action.name: Freezing Tomb {@recharge 5}
entries: The devil sends out a burst of cold in a 60-foot cone that clings to living creatures, sapping their vitality. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a creature gains 27 ({@dice 6d8}) temporary HP. As long as it has this temporary HP, the creature is {@condition restrained}, {@condition blinded}, and has vulnerability to fire damage. A creature that starts its turn with any of this temporary HP must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be forced to expend a hit die. If it cannot, it drops to 0 HP.

reaction.name: Cold Snap
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a ranged attack or harmful spell, the ice devil uses its Ice Wall ability. If the devil is no longer a valid target, the attack or spell fails.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Devilish Transposition
entries: At the start of each of its turn, the devil may switch positions with any medium or larger devil within 60 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes three attacks with its tail. It can use Hurl Flame or Advance! in place of any of these, if available.

action.name: Wounding Fork
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage and the target is dragged 5 feet toward the devil, or knocked {@condition prone} if it can't be. If this attack was made at advantage, the target suffers an infernal wound. A wounded creature loses 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points at the end of its turn for each wound it has. This effect ends when the target receives magical healing, or when a creature uses its action to stanch the wounds with a successful {@dc 12} Wisdom (Medicine) check.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

action.name: Advance! {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to two devils CR 10 or below within 60 feet may each move up to half their speed and make a melee attack.

reaction.name: Besiege
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the devil may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or be cursed, granting all devils advanatage on attacks made against it until the end of the horned devil's next turn.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Hellish Weapons
entries: The erinyes's weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage on a hit (included in the attacks).

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The erinyes has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: As a bonus action, the erinyes may  transform into a humanoid or beast, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in any form, and it reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the erinyes' choice).

trait.name: Corrupted Presence
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the erinyes must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be

{@condition frightened} by the erinyes until the beginning of its next turn. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is also {@condition charmed} as long as it remains {@condition frightened}, and obeys the Erinyes' verbal commands. A creature succeeds automatically on this save if the Erinyes took hostile action against it since the end of the creature's last turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The erinyes makes three attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned}. The poison lasts until it is removed by the {@spell lesser restoration} spell or similar magic.

action.name: Imperil the Soul
entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by the Erinyes must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or take 77 ({@damage 14d10}) psychic damage. If this would reduce the creature to 0 hit points, it instead deals no damage, and the target is {@condition charmed} by the erinyes for as long as they remain on the same plane of existence.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The erinyes adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the erinyes must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Desecrating Presence
entries: Creatures of the devil's choice within 30 ft. of it subtract {@dice 1d4} from any saving throws they make.

trait.name: Retractable Claws
entries: As a bonus action, the devil may extend or reduce the reach of its claws by 5 ft., to a maximum of 15 ft.

trait.name: Befuddling Haze
entries: Creatures within 30 ft. of the devil have disadvantage on Insight, Investigation, and Perception skill checks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes three attacks, each of which it may replace with a use of its corrupting imprecation.

action.name: Torment Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Corrupting Imprecation
entries: One creature within 120 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw or suffer a Curse of Corruption for the next minute. At the beginning of each of a cursed creature's turns, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage, ending the effect on a success.

legendary.name: Desperate Measures
entries: One friendly devil or dominated creature within 30 ft. may use its reaction to make a melee attack against a creature in range. If the corruption devil has fewer than 169 hit points, each friendly devil and dominated creature in range may instead use its reaction to make a melee attack.

legendary.name: Sway the Corrupt
entries: One creature within 60 ft. that is afflicted with a Curse of Corruption must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or act under the devil's control until the end of its following turn.

legendary.name: Doom the Corrupt (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature within 60 ft. that is afflicted with a Curse of Corruption must succeed on a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw or have its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores each reduced by {@dice 1d4}, to a minimum of 1, until it completes a short or long rest.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Grasping Chains
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 15 ft. of the devil must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dextertiy saving throw or be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}) until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Torturer
entries: A creature that fails a saving throw imposed by the devil may use its reaction to reveal a deep secret or weakness. If it does, it may reroll that saving throw, taking the second result.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes three attacks with its gorechain flail.

action.name: Gorechain Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 5d6 + 5}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). On a critical hit, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Flay Living
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by the devil must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 55 ({@dice 10d10}) and begins to bleed, or takes half as much damage on a success. A bleeding creature repeats this saving throw at the beginning of each of its turns, losing 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points on a failure or ending the effect on a success.

reaction.name: Gorechain Takeover
entries: As a reaction to a creature {@condition grappled} by it making an attack or casting a spell, the devil changes the target of the attack to another valid target in range of its choice.

reaction.name: Chains of Vengeance (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 116 hit points, the chain devil makes two chain attacks.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Living Chains
entries: The chain devil has two chains, though it can control up to five through its Animate Chains ability. Each chain can be attacked (AC 20; 20 hit points; immunity to psychic and thunder damage). Destroying a chain deals no damage to the  devil.

trait.name: Unnerving Mask
entries: Beneath its chains and wounds, the devil always appears to be a deceased individual that has some significance to the observer. A creature that starts its turn within 30 ft. of the devil must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or subtract {@dice 1d4} from attack rolls it makes against the devil until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil uses its Animate Chains, then makes a number of attacks equal to the number of chains it currently has.

action.name: Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage and the target suffers an additional effect of the devil's choice.

items.name: Barbed
entries: The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) in place. While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained} and takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns.

items.name: Bladed
entries: The target takes an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage.

items.name: Weighted
entries: The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or take 3 ({@dice 1d6}) bludgeoning damgage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Animate Chains
entries: One chain the devil can see within 60 feet of it magically sprouts razor-edged barbs and animates under the devil's control for the next minute, provided that the chains aren't being worn or carried. Whenever the devil uses its multiattack, it may move each chain under its control up to 15 ft. and make an attack from its location (included in the multiattack).

reaction.name: Battle Dance
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack of opportunity, the devil makes a chain attack.

reaction.name: Chains of Vengeance (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 86 hit points, the chain devil makes two chain attacks.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Compel Obedience
entries: When the bone devil damages an ally with an attack, it may end one effect causing the creature to be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 HP, creatures of the bone devil's choice within 30 feet each have advantage on attacks and saving throws until the end of the bone devil's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the bone devil can knock the target {@condition prone} or grapple it (escape {@dc 16}).

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage. The next time the target is hit with an attack, it has vulnerability to all that attack's damage.

reaction.name: Stop Resisting!
entries: As a reaction to a creature failing an attempt to escape its grapple, the bone devil may make a sting attack against it.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Steadfast
entries: Allied creatures within 10 feet of the devil can't be {@condition frightened} and have +1 AC.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes two attacks: one with its beard and one with its glaive.

action.name: Beard
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target can't regain hit points. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Wounding Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage.  If this attack was made at advantage, the target suffers an infernal wound. A wounded creature loses 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points at the end of its turn for each wound it has. This effect ends when the target receives magical healing, or when a creature uses its action to stanch the wounds with a successful {@dc 12} Wisdom (Medicine) check.

reaction.name: Follow Up
entries: As a reaction to a devil of CR 4 or greater hitting a creature within 10 feet of the bearded devil with an attack, the bearded devil may make a glaive attack against the same creature at advantage.

reaction.name: Battle Frenzy
entries: As a reaction to starting its turn below 26 hit points, the bearded devil may go into a frenzy. Until the end of its next turn, the devil has resistance to all damage and makes attacks at advantage.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Barbed Hide
entries: At the start of each of its turns, the barbed devil deals 5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage to any creature grappling it or {@condition grappled} by it.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Paranoid
entries: The devil can't be surprised. It has advantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks made to determine if a creature intends to betray it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes three attacks with its Claws or uses its Hurl Flame twice.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage and the creature is {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Tail Lash
entries: As a reaction to a creature entering the devil's reach, the devil may force the creature to succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be pushed 5 feet backwards and knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Master Shapechanger
entries: As a bonus action, the yochlol can polymorph into a form that resembles a female drow, a giant spider, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The yochlol has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The yochlol can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack (Spider form only)
entries: The yochlol makes two Bite attacks and uses its Compel.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. (10 ft. in demon form), one target. {@h}6 ({@dice 1d6 + 3}) piercing in spider form damage plus 18 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Compel
entries: The yochlol compels one creature {@condition charmed} by it to move up to half its speed and make a single weapon attack as a reaction.

action.name: Metamorphose (Demon form only)
entries: The yochlol breathes a foul miasma into the lungs of a {@condition charmed} creature. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or have its Constitution score reduced by {@dice 1d10} until it completes a long rest. A creature whose Constitution is reduced to 0 in this way transforms into a Drider.

action.name: Charm (Drow form only, concentration)
entries: One humanoid the yochlol can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed}. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the yochlol's verbal or telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. When the yochlol's charm ends on a creature, the target takes 44 ({@damage 8d10}) psychic damage and is immune to this yochlol's Charm for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Secret Mouth (Demon or Drow form only)
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the yochlol may make a bite attack against the attacker.

reaction.name: Dissolve (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 111 Hit Points, the Yochlol disolves into a cloud of poisonous gas and moves up to its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity. A creature whose space it moves through in this way must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn. At the beginning of its next turn, the yochlol reverts to its true form.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The demon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Spectral Weapons
entries: The demon's attacks treat all creatures as unarmored (an unarmored creature's AC is usually 10 plus its Dexterity modifier.)

action.name: Multitattack
entries: The demon makes two attacks with its maddening touch and uses its whispers of madness, if available.

action.name: Maddening Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) psychic damage and the target's Wisdom is reduced by 2 ({@dice 1d4}) until it completes a short or long rest. A creature reduced to 0 Wisdom in this way becomes hostile to all living creatures, including itself, until it recovers.

action.name: Whispers of Madness {@recharge 5}
entries: Each non-fiend, non-undead creature within 30 ft. must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature uses its reaction to move up to make a melee attack against a living creature in range.

action.name: Create Allip
entries: One {@condition unconscious} humanoid creature within 10 ft. of the demon must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or make a melee attack against itself. If the attack hits, the creature dies and rises as an allip at the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Shadow Glide
entries: As a reaction to taking damage of a type it is resistant to, the demon may teleport up to 60 feet and turn {@condition invisible} until it makes an attack or uses its whispers of madness.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The wastrilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Corrupt Water
entries: At the start of each of the wastrilith's turns, exposed water within 30 feet of it is Corrupted. Underwater, this effect lightly obscures the area until a current clears it away.

A creature that starts its turn in the area, or enters it for the first time on a turn, must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be unable to distinguish friend from foe for the next hour, or until it leaves the area. On a success, a creature becomes immune to the effect for 24 hours.

trait.name: Villiform Teeth
entries: The wastrilith can maintain a
grapple even while {@condition incapacitated} or dead. A
creature that fails an attempt to escape the
wastrilith's grapple takes 6 ({@dice 1d12}) piercing
damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wastrilith uses Grasping Spout and makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Needle-Toothed Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d12 + 4}) piercing damage, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). While a creature is {@condition grappled} in this way, the wastrilith can't bite another creature or use its breath weapon, and this attack scores a critical on a 18-20 against it.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Grasping Spout
entries: The wastrilith magically launches a spout of water at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw, and it has disadvantage if it's underwater. On a failed save, it takes 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) acid damage and is pulled up to 60 feet toward the wastrilith. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't pulled.

action.name: Boiling Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The wastrilith exhales a stream of boiling water in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Ice Barrier
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 111 hit points, the wastrilith raises a barrier of ice comprised of up to 10 contiguous panels, each 20 ft. by 20 ft. and 1 ft. thick., and wholely within 120 ft. A creature in the wall's space when it forms is moved to a side of its choice.
The wall can be damaged and breached; each 20-foot section has AC 5, 30 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to acid, cold, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The vrock has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Demonic Rampage
entries: When the vrock reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the vrock gains 11 ({@dice 2d10}) temporary HP. If the creature was a demon, the vrock instead gains 20 temporary HP and can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a beak attack.

trait.name: Inevitable Betrayal
entries: The vrock has advantage on the first attack it makes each turn against an ally.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The vrock doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vrock makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Stunning Screech (1/Day)
entries: The vrock emits a horrific screech. Each creature within 20 feet of it that can hear it and that isn't a demon must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the vrock's next turn.

reaction.name: Spores
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 33 HP, the vrock exudes a  15-foot-radius cloud of toxic spores that extends out from the vrock. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, a target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Emptying a vial of holy water on the target also ends the effect on it.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the tanarukk can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The tanarukk has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Burning of Aeons
entries: Whenever the tanarukk takes fire damage, it gains 10 temporary hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tanarukk makes three melee attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or lose an ear.

action.name: Fireburst Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target suffers an additonal effect:
If the target was not on fire, it catches fire. Until someone takes an action to extinguish it, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

If the target was on fire, it unleashes an explosion of flame. Each creature within 20 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or half as much damage on a success.

reaction.name: Fury Unleashed
entries: As a reaction to passing a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, the tanarukk erupts into flame. For the next minute, the tanarukk and any creature {@condition grappled} by it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns, and deals an additional 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage with each of its attacks.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the tanarukk can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The tanarukk has advantage on saving throws against spells and other tragical effects.

trait.name: Unbridled Rage
entries: Whenever the tanarukk moves, it must move directly toward the creature that most recently took hostile action against it, if it can see one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tanarukk makes three melee attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or lose an ear.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, the tanarukk may grapple a creature (escape {@dc 15}) or shove it {@condition prone}.

action.name: Skullcleaver Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage. This attack is made at advantage against a {@condition grappled} creature.

reaction.name: Fury Unleashed
entries: As a reaction to passing a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, the tanarukk erupts into flame. Until a creature takes an action to extinguish it, the tanarukk and any creature {@condition grappled} by it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns, and deals an additional 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage with each of its attacks.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The demon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or Darkness, the demon can take the Hide action as a Bonus Action.

trait.name: Light Dependance
entries: While in darkness, the demon is {@condition invisible}. While in bright light, the demon has advantage on attack rolls, but loses its damage resistances.

trait.name: Spectral Weapons
entries: The demon's attacks treat all creatures as unarmored (an unarmored creature's AC is usually 10 plus its Dexterity modifier.)

trait.name: Dread Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 60 ft. of the demon that cannot see it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Multattack
entries: The demon makes two attacks with its soul-rending claws.

action.name: Soul-Rending Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) psychic damage or, if the demon had advantage on the attack roll, 13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) psychic damage. A {@condition frightened} humanoid killed by this attack has its soul trapped in an iron token that the demon extracts from its throat.

reaction.name: Shadow Glide (Dim light only)
entries: As a reaction to taking damage of a type it is resistant to, the demon may teleport up to 60 feet and turn {@condition invisible} until it makes an attack. If it does, it can't make attacks on its next turn.

variant.name: Note: Soul Tokens
entries: Casting Remove Curse on a soul token frees the soul trapped within it, reducing the token to rust.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The quasit can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a bat (speed 10 ft. fly 40 ft.), a centipede (40 ft., climb 40 ft.), or a toad (40 ft., swim 40 ft.), or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the speed changes noted. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The quasit has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Claws (Bite in Beast Form)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage and become {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn. This attack is made at advantage against a {@condition frightened} creature.

action.name: Invisibility (concentration)
entries: The quasit magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks or uses Scare.

action.name: Scare {@recharge}
entries: One creature of the quasit's choice within 20 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn. If the quasit is {@condition invisible}, it may use this ability as Bonus Action.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The marilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The marilith's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Reactive
entries: The marilith can take one reaction on every turn in a combat.

trait.name: More Fearsome Than Death
entries: If another demon within 60 feet would fail a Wisdom save, the marilith may choose for it to succeed. If it does, the demon is {@condition frightened} of the Marilith until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The marilith makes seven attacks, one of which may be with its Constrict.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the marilith can grapple the target (escape {@dc 17}).

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and can't breathe, and the marilith can't constrict another target.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the marilith adds 5 to its AC against the triggering attack.

reaction.name: Overwhelm
entries: As a reaction to missing a creature it is grappling with a melee attack, the marilith may add 5 to its attack roll.

reaction.name: Tail Lash
entries: As a reaction to a creature entering the marilith's reach, the marilith may force the creature to succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet backwards and knocked {@condition prone}. A creature has advantage on this save if the marilith has a creature {@condition grappled} with its Constrict ability.

reaction.name: Crush
entries: As a reaction to a creature the marilith has {@condition grappled} with its Constrict ability speaking or casting a spell with a verbal component, the marilith crushes the air out of its lungs. The creature immediately begins to suffocate.

reaction.name: Teleport
entries: As a reaction to passing a saving throw against a spell, the marilith magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet closer to the spell's caster..

variant.name: Note: Rules Clarification
entries: The marilith's Crush reaction triggers after the triggering spell resolves.

variant.name: Note: Rules Reminder
entries: A suffocating creature can survive for a number of rounds equal to its Constitution modifier (minimum of 1 round). At the start of its next turn, it drops to 0 Hit Points and is dying, and it can't regain Hit Points or be stabilized until it can breathe again.

trait.name: Mindless Hate
entries: If the mane attempts to do anything other than attack the nearest creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 5} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the mane instead attacks the nearest creature.

trait.name: Acidic Cloud
entries: When a mane dies, it dissolves into a cloud of noxious vapor. A creature within 5 feet must make a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or take 3 ({@dice 1d6}) points of acid damage.

action.name: Maddening Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage and the target has disadvantage on attacks that don't target the mane on its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hezrou has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sickening Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the hezrou must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or subtract {@dice 1d4} from attack rolls and saving throws it makes until the start of its next turn. If the Hezrou has 68 HP or fewer, a creature instead subtracts {@dice 1d8} from attack rolls and saving throws until the start of its next turn on a failed save.

trait.name: Bootlicker
entries: A creature within 30 feet of the Hezrou may use its action to authoritatively shout a command. The command must be worded in such a manner as to make the course of action sound reasonable, and the Hezrou has advantage on this save if the command does not involve violence. If a creature does, the Hezrou must make a {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw or begin to follow the command. The Hezrou may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hezrou makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@dice 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage. If this attack targets a dead or {@condition unconscious} creature, the Hezrou is shrouded in magical darkness until the end of its next turn, becoming heavily obscured.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@dice 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Spiderlike
entries: The haures can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings and across webs, without penalty. While in contact with a web, the haures knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Gleeful Carnage
entries: While adjacent to three or more hostile creatures, the haures has advantage on attack rolls. If the haures takes or deals damage, it treats all adjacent creatures as hostile until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The haures' long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The haures has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The haures makes three attacks, one of which may be with its bite. It may replace one of its attacks with either a use of its Web Grab or its Goring Charge, if available.

action.name: Ravenous Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the goristro gains resistance to all damage until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: War Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. Creatures within 5 feet of the target must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking half the attack's damage on a failed save.

action.name: Web Grab
entries: Each creature in a 10 ft. radius centered on a point within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or be dragged up to 30 ft. toward the haures.

action.name: Goring Charge {@recharge 5}
entries: The haures moves up to 30 feet in a straight line and can move through the space of any creature smaller than Large. The first time it enters a creature's space during this move, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or take 40 ({@damage 6d10 + 7}) piercing damage and be pushed ahead of the haures for the rest of this move. If a creature fails the save by 5 or more, it is also knocked {@condition prone}. A {@condition prone} creature makes this save at disadvantage.
Реакция

action.name: Quick Pick
entries: As a reaction to a hostile creature moving into the haurus' range, the haurus makes a war pick attack against it.

trait.name: Hard Faller
entries: The goristro has vulnerability to fall damage. While the goristro is within 5 ft. of a precipice at least 10 feet high, it has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would Frighten it.

trait.name: Refuge in Fury
entries: If the goristro would be {@condition frightened}, it may choose not be. If it does, it cannot distinguish friend from foe for the next minute.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The goristro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goristro uses its Goring Charge and makes a Bite attack. It may replace its Goring Charge with two Fist attacks.

action.name: Ravenous Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the goristro gains resistance to all damage until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet backwards.

action.name: Hoof
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC: 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Goring Charge
entries: The goristro moves up to 30 feet in a straight line and can move through the space of any creature smaller than Large. The first time it enters a creature's space during this move, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or take 35 ({@damage 5d10 + 7}) piercing damage and be pushed ahead of the goristro for the rest of this move. If a creature fails the save by 5 or more, it is also knocked {@condition prone}. A {@condition prone} creature makes this save at disadvantage.
Реакция

action.name: Vicious Stomp
