Each creature within 10 feet of it must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried in that area are ignited.

trait.name: Ignited Illumination
entries: As a bonus action, the magmin can set itself ablaze or extinguish its flames. While ablaze, the magmin sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

trait.name: Molten Body
entries: If the magmin takes any cold damage, it is {@condition petrified}. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the magmin melts and warps. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls.

action.name: Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage and the target ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls and takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage at the end of each of its turns.

reaction.name: Cackling Caprice
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the magmin may force the creature to make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks made with metal weapons.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the lava child dies, it explodes in a burst of fire and magma. Each creature within 10 feet of it must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried in that area are ignited.

trait.name: Metal Immunity
entries: The lava child can move through metal without hindrance, and it has advantage on attack rolls against any creature wearing metal armor or using a metal shield.

trait.name: Molten Body
entries: If the lava child takes any cold damage, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition petrified}. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the lava child melts and warps. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lava child makes two attacks: one with its Furnace Grin and one with its obsidian claws.

action.name: Furnace Grin Gape
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) fire damage and the creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the lava child's next turn.

action.name: Obsidian Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage and the target ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls and takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the end of each of its turns.

action.name: Swallow Whole
entries: The lava child begins to swallow a Medium or smaller creature that is {@condition incapacitated}. At the beginning of the lava child's next turn, the target is swallowed and incinerated, and the lava child regains all hit points. This action is disrupted if the lava child takes any cold damage.

monster.name: Invisible Stalker
languages: understands Common but doesn't speak it

trait.name: Invisibility
entries: The stalker is {@condition invisible}. If fine particles are scattered in its space, it loses this invisiblity for the next minute.

trait.name: Enraged by Captivity
entries: At each dawn beyond the 7th day since its summoning to the material plane, a summoned stalker may make a Wisdom saving throw against its summoner's save DC. On a success, the stalker breaks free and can either return to its home plane or seek revenge.

trait.name: Faultless Tracker
entries: The stalker is given a quarry by its summoner. The stalker knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The stalker also knows the location of its summoner.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The stalker makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. A creature {@condition grappled} by the stalker must succeed on {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or lose its held breath and begin to suffocate.

action.name: Steal Breath
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) and cannot breathe.

action.name: Hurricane Gust {@recharge 5}
entries: A creature within 5 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pushed 30 ft. away. This movement can take the creature through windows and over low ramparts.

action.name: Expel Matter
entries: The stalker purges itself of particles suspended in its form. The {@condition invisible} stalker can take the Hide action as a bonus action this turn.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The marid can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the marid dies, its body disintegrates into a burst of water and foam , leaving behind only equipment the marid was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Water Mastery
entries: The marid controls the flow of water in a 120 ft. radius around it. A creature that starts its turn in the area has the marid's choice of any two of the following properties:
A 90 foot swim speed
The ability to breathe underwater
The ability to walk on water
At the beginning of its turn, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be unable to swim closer to the marid until the beginning of its next turn.
At the beginning of its turn, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be unable to swim away from the marid until the beginning of its next turn.
At the beginning of its turn, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 2d8} bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The marid makes two trident attacks.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Water Jet
entries: The marid magically shoots water in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC: 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) bludgeoning damage and, if it is Huge or smaller, is pushed up to 20 feet away from the marid and knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, a target takes half the bludgeoning damage, but is neither pushed nor knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Inexorable Current
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack by a creature affected by its Water Mastery trait, the marid forces the creature to make a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be pulled 20 feet towards the Marid.

reaction.name: Clearwater Lens
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 114 HP, the Marid turns itself and creatures of its choice within 120 feet {@condition invisible} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the efreet dies, its body disintegrates in a flash of fire and puff of smoke, leaving behind only equipment the efreet was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Flamestrider
entries: The efreet may spend 5 ft of movement to teleport from one source of flames to another that it can see within 30 ft.

trait.name: Blazing Soul
entries: A creature that is on fire and within 10 feet of one or more efreets takes an additional 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage the first time each turn that it takes fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The efreet uses its flameclaw summoning twice, then makes a flameclaw strike with each of its active flameclaws.

action.name: Flameclaw Summoning
entries: The efreet summons a claw of flames that lasts for a minute at a location within 60 ft. The claw counts as a creature that is size large, has an AC of 20 and 1 hit point, fails all saves, and has its own reaction with which to make attacks of opportunity. Additionally, whenever the efreet summons a claw, it may cause each of its summoned claws to move up to 15 ft.

action.name: Flameclaw Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage and the target suffers an additonal effect of the efreet's choice:
The target catches fire. Until someone takes an action to extinguish it, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.
The target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 ft. in a direction of the efreet's choice.
The target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 19}) by the flameclaw.

action.name: Plane Shift (1/Day)
entries: The efreet and up to eight other willing or {@condition incapacitated} creatures teleport to a location it is familiar with on this or another plane.

reaction.name: Fiery Shield
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a melee attack, the efreet may ignite the attacker, imposing disadvantage on the triggering attack. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the efreet dies, its body disintegrates in a flash of fire and puff of smoke, leaving behind only equipment the efreet was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Flamestrider
entries: The efreet may spend 5 ft of movement to teleport from one source of flames to another that it can see within 30 ft.

trait.name: Blazing Soul
entries: A creature that is on fire and within 10 feet of one or more efreets takes an additional 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage the first time each turn that it takes fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The efreet attacks once with its ignition fist and uses its Curse of Smoldering Embers, if available.

action.name: Ignition Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and the target suffers an additonal effect:
If the target was not on fire, it catches fire. Until someone takes an action to extinguish it, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

If the target was on fire, it unleashes an explosion of flame. Each creature within 20 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or half as much damage on a success.

action.name: Curse of Smoldering Embers {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or be cursed. While cursed in this way, a creature has vulnerability to the first source of fire damage it takes each minute, and ignites whenever it takes fire damage.

action.name: Plane Shift (1/Day)
entries: The efreet and up to eight other willing or {@condition incapacitated} creatures teleport to a location it is familiar with on this or another plane.

reaction.name: Fiery Shield
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a melee attack, the efreet may ignite the attacker, imposing disadvantage on the triggering attack. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the efreet dies, its body disintegrates in a flash of fire and puff of smoke, leaving behind only equipment the efreet was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Flamestrider
entries: The efreet may spend 5 ft of movement to teleport from one source of flames to another that it can see within 30 ft.

trait.name: Blazing Soul
entries: A creature that is on fire and within 10 feet of one or more efreets takes an additional 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage the first time each turn that it takes fire damage.

action.name: Dancing Fireblade
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit 13 ({@dice 2d6 + 6}) slashing and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage. If this attack hits, the efreet uses this ability again, targeting another creature within 20 feet of the previous target. Attacks beyond the first one originate from the previous target, though the efreet must use its own senses. The blade returns to the efreet's hand at the end of its turn.

action.name: Whirling Strike
entries: Each creature within 10 ft. of the efreet must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@dice 2d6 + 6}) slashing and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage and be pushed 5 ft. away or half as much damage on a success. A creature that fails by 5 or more is not pushed away, and is instead knocked {@condition prone} and catches fire. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Plane Shift (1/Day)
entries: The efreet and up to eight other willing or {@condition incapacitated} creatures teleport to a location it is familiar with on this or another plane.

reaction.name: Fiery Shield
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a melee attack, the efreet may ignite the attacker, imposing disadvantage on the triggering attack. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the efreet dies, its body disintegrates in a flash of fire and puff of smoke, leaving behind only equipment the efreet was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Flamestrider
entries: The efreet may spend 5 ft of movement to teleport from one source of flames to another that it can see within 30 ft.

trait.name: Blazing Soul
entries: A creature that is on fire and within 10 feet of one or more efreets takes an additional 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage the first time each turn that it takes fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The efreet makes two attacks with either its scimitar or its hurl flame.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 5d6}) fire damage. Surfaces targeted with this attack ignite.

action.name: Blazing Barrier {@recharge 5}
entries: The efreet raises a wall of flames that burn for the next minute on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is comprised of 6 contiguous panels, each 1 foot thick and up to 10 feet long and 20 feet high. Creatures that start their turn in the wall's space or enter it for the first time on a turn must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 23 ({@damage 5d8}) fire damage, or half as much on a success.

action.name: Plane Shift (1/Day)
entries: The efreet and up to eight other willing or {@condition incapacitated} creatures teleport to a location it is familiar with on this or another plane.

reaction.name: Fiery Shield
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a melee attack, the efreet may ignite the attacker, imposing disadvantage on the triggering attack. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the djinni dies, its body disintegrates into a warm breeze, leaving behind only equipment the djinni was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Grant Wish (3/Year)
entries: The djinni can grant a wish to a creature, replicating the effects of any spell of 8th level or below. It cannot use this ability on its own behalf.

trait.name: Turbulent Currents
entries: Ranged attacks against the djinni from more than 30 ft. away are made at disadvantage.

trait.name: Whirlwind
entries: The djinni is surrounded by a 5 foot radius whirlwind that extends thirty feet below and above it. When a creature starts its turn in the area, the djinni may force it to make a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be carried aloft, rising up to 30 feet. While floating in this way, the creature is {@condition restrained} and moves with the whirlwind. A creature may repeat this save as an action, escaping the whirlwind on a success.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the djinni fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The djinni makes three scimitar attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) thunder damage.

action.name: Airburst
entries: Each creature in the djinni's whirlwind must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) thunder damage and be pushed 10 feet in a direction of the djinn's choice.

action.name: Crackling Doom {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to four creatures within 60 feet must each succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) lightning damage, or half as much on a success.

legendary.name: Wandering Gale
entries: The djinni moves up to half its speed. Each creature that the whirlwind moves over must save against it or be carried aloft.

legendary.name: Agitate Wind (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each creature caught in the djinni's whirlwind takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) bludgeoning damage.

legendary.name: Eject (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature carried aloft in the whirlwind is lauched up to 60 feet out of it and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Gaseous Form (Costs 3 Actions, 1/day)
entries: The djinni gains resistance to all damage until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the djinni dies, its body disintegrates into a warm breeze, leaving behind only equipment the djinni was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Turbulent Currents
entries: Ranged attacks against the djinni from more than 30 ft. away are made at disadvantage.

trait.name: Whirlwind
entries: The djinni is surrounded by a 5 foot radius whirlwind that extends thirty feet below and above it. When a creature starts its turn in the area, the djinni may force it to make a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be carried aloft, rising up to 30 feet. While floating in this way, the creature is {@condition restrained} and moves with the whirlwind. A creature may repeat this save as an action, escaping the whirlwind on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The djinni makes three scimitar attacks and uses its airburst.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) thunder damage.

action.name: Airburst
entries: Each creature in the djinni's whirlwind must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) thunder damage and be pushed 10 feet in a direction of the djinn's choice.

reaction.name: Gaseous Essence
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack, the djinni halve the attack's damage.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the djinni dies, its body disintegrates into crystalline powder, leaving behind only equipment the dao was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The dao can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the dao doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Earth Mastery
entries: Earth and unworked stone in a 15 ft. radius around the Dao moves at its whim. A creature that starts its turn on the ground in the area must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 3d8}) bludgeoning damage and be pushed 10 ft. in a direction of the dao's choice.

trait.name: Rooted Stance
entries: If the dao does not use its multiattack on its turn, it has resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dao has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dao makes three stone fist attacks.

action.name: Stone Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) slashing damage, the target is knocked {@condition prone}, and must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be unable to stand for the next minute. An affected creature repeats this save at the end of its turn, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Stonewall Eruption
entries: The dao raises a wall of stone on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 10 feet long and 10 feet high. When the wall appears, creatures in its space are pushed to a side of their choice and must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) bludgeoning damage, or half as much on a success.
The wall can be damaged and breached; each 10-foot section has AC 20, 30 hit points, vulnerability to thunder damage, and immunity to necrotic, poison, and psychic damage.

action.name: Shockwave Stomp {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition prone} target. {@h}83 ({@damage 14d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the Dao's next turn. The ground in a 15 ft. radius around the dao becomes dificult terrain, and each other creature within that radius is pushed 10 ft. away.

reaction.name: Fissures
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 151 hit points, the dao opens up to four fissures in the earth, each 5 ft. wide, 20 ft. long, and 15 ft. deep. A creature in one or more of the areas when they open must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or fall in, moving to an adjacent space on a success.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the djinni dies, its body disintegrates into crystalline powder, leaving behind only equipment the dao was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Earth Mastery
entries: Earth and unworked stone in a 15 ft. radius around the Dao moves at its whim. A creature that starts its turn on the ground in the area must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) bludgeoning damage and be pushed 10 ft. in a direction of the dao's choice.

trait.name: Rooted Stance
entries: If the dao does not use its multiattack on its turn, it has resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dao makes three stone lash attacks.

action.name: Stone Lash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d6 + 6}) slashing damage and the target is pulled up to 10 feet toward the dao.

action.name: Shockwave Stomp {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition prone} target. {@h}83 ({@damage 14d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the Dao's next turn. The ground in a 15 ft. radius around the dao becomes dificult terrain, and each other creature within that radius is pushed 10 ft. away.

reaction.name: Dismaying Whip
entries: As a reaction to a creature in range standing from {@condition prone}, the dao makes a stone lash attack against it.

reaction.name: Mountain Strength Slam
entries: As a reaction to a creature involuntarily moving within 5 ft of it, the dao forces the creature to succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and unable to stand on its following turn.

reaction.name: Fissures
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 126 hit points, the dao opens up to four fissures in the earth, each 5 ft. wide, 20 ft. long, and 15 ft. deep. A creature in one or more of the areas when they open must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or fall in, moving to an adjacent space on a success.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the djinni dies, its body disintegrates into crystalline powder, leaving behind only equipment the dao was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Earth Mastery
entries: Earth and unworked stone in a 15 ft. radius around the Dao moves at its whim. A creature that starts its turn on the ground in the area must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) bludgeoning damage and be pushed 10 ft. in a direction of the dao's choice.

trait.name: Rooted Stance
entries: If the dao does not use its multiattack on its turn, it has resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dao makes three maul attacks.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Boulder Charge
entries: The Dao charges 30 ft. in a straight line. Each creature in the path of its charge must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) bludgeoning damage and be pushed ahead of the dao, or take half as much damage and stop the dao's charge on a succcess.

action.name: Shockwave Stomp {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition prone} target. {@h}55 ({@damage 9d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the Dao's next turn. Each other creature within 15 feet of the dao is pushed 10 ft. away.

reaction.name: Earthen Grasp
entries: As a reaction to a creature falling {@condition prone} within 15 ft. of it, the dao forces the creature to succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the end of the Dao's next turn.

reaction.name: Fissures
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 99 hit points, the dao opens up to four fissures in the earth, each 5 ft. wide, 20 ft. long, and 15 ft. deep. A creature in one or more of the areas when they open must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or fall in, moving to an adjacent space on a success.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

trait.name: Brittle Body
entries: If the gargoyle takes 10 or more bludgeoning damage from a single source, it can no longer use its multiattack until it completes a short or long rest. If it takes 10 or more bludgeoning damage from a single source a second time, it loses its fly speed until it completes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Clumsy Flier
entries: The gargoyle falls at the end of a turn if it's airborne and the only thing holding it aloft is its flying speed. Attacks it makes while airborne are made at disadvantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gargoyle makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) косой урон.

walk.condition: (30 ft. when rolling 60 ft. rolling downhill)

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the galeb duhr remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal boulder.

trait.name: Rolling Charge
entries: If the galeb duhr rolls at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Clang!
entries: A creature that misses the galeb duhr with an attack of opportunity must make a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be disarmed and have its weapon flung 15 feet in a random direction.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Shockwave {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in a 30 ft. cone must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 19 ({@damage 3d12}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or half as much damage on a success. Additionally, the affected area become difficult terrain.

reaction.name: Animated Boulders
entries: As a reaction to a creature that is within 30 feet of a mundane boulder hitting the galeb duhr with an attack, the galeb duhr may cause the boulder to move up to 30 feet and make a slam attack against the attacker, using the galeb duhr's statistics.

trait.name: Flail Tentacles
entries: The flail snail has five flail tentacles. Whenever the snail takes 10 or more damage from a single source, one of its tentacles dies.  If the snail has no tentacles remaining, it retracts into its shell and begins to wail loudly.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The flail snail makes as many flail tentacle attacks as it has flail tentacles, then uses its Shift Harmonics.

action.name: Flail Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If this attack misses by 5 or more, the target may use its reaction to make a single melee attack against the snail.

action.name: Shift Harmonics
entries: The snail shifts the swirling patterns of its shell, adopting two of the following effects until the beginning of its next turn.

items.name: Resistance
entries: The snail has advantage on saving throws against spells.

items.name: Diffraction
entries: Spell attacks made against the snail have disadvantage.

items.name: Reflection
entries: If the snail is missed with a spell attack, the spell is reflected back at its caster.

items.name: Refraction
entries: If the snail succeeds on a saving throw against a spell, the spell's energy is converted into a magical explosion. Each creature within 30 ft. of the snail must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} force damage per level of the spell, or half as much on a success.

items.name: Absorption
entries: If the snail is targeted with a spell, it gains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) temporary hit points.

reaction.name: Shell Defense
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a ranged weapon attack, the snail withdraws into its shell, gaining a +4 bonus to AC until the beginning of its next turn. It cannot attack while withdrawn.

trait.name: Flail Tentacles
entries: The flail snail has five flail tentacles. Whenever the snail takes 10 or more damage from a single source, one of its tentacles dies. If the snail has no tentacles remaining, it retracts into its shell and begins to wail loudly.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The flail snail makes as many flail tentacle attacks as it has flail tentacles, then uses its Shift Harmonics.

action.name: Flail Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If this attack misses by 5 or more, the target may use its reaction to make a single melee attack against the snail.

action.name: Shift Harmonics
entries: The snail shifts the swirling patterns of its shell, adopting one of the following effects until the beginning of its next turn.

items.name: Resistance
entries: The snail has advantage on saving throws against spells.

items.name: Diffraction
entries: Spell attacks made against the snail have disadvantage.

items.name: Reflection
entries: If the snail is missed with a spell attack, the spell is reflected back at its caster.

reaction.name: Shell Defense
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a ranged weapon attack, the snail withdraws into its shell, gaining a +4 bonus to AC until the beginning of its next turn. It cannot attack while withdrawn.

trait.name: Freeze
entries: Whenever the myrmidon takes cold damage, its speed is reduced by 10 and it loses its damage resistances until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Crashing Tide
entries: If the myrmidon moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with an attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace a use of its Drench, if available.

action.name: Geyser Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit* 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage. This attack has advantage against a creature submerged in water.

action.name: Drench {@recharge 5}
entries: The myrmidon spews a stream of cold water in a 15 foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. If this damage causes a creature to make a concentration check, it makes it at disadvantage.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon unleashes a torrent of crashing water. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) bludgeoning damage, be pushed 10 ft. away, and be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Weightless
entries: Whenever the myrmidon takes damage, it is pushed 10 feet away from the source of the damage.

trait.name: Void Aura
entries: A creature within 5 feet of the myrmidon cannot speak or breathe.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with its Cavitate, if available.

action.name: Dragging Lash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. *Hit* 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pulled 10 feet towards the myrmidon. This attack has advantage against a levitating or flying creature.

action.name: Cavitate (Concentration, Recharge 5-6)
entries: For the next minute, the myrmidon is surrounded by sucking winds. A creature that start its turn within 5 feet of the myrmidon must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be unable to move away from it until the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon briefly implodes. Each creature within 15 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Thunder damage and be pulled 10 feet towards the myrmidon.

reaction.name: Vaccuum Channel
entries: As a reaction to an allied creature within 15 feet being targeted with an attack, the myrmidon may pull the allied creature 10 feet closer. If the allied creature ends this movement out of range of the triggering attack, the attack misses.

trait.name: Weightless
entries: Whenever the myrmidon takes damage, it is pushed 10 feet away from the source of the damage.

trait.name: Condense
entries: If the steam myrmidon takes cold damage, it is reduced to size Small and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with its Heavy Air

action.name: Hazy Pike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit* 15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) slashing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away. This attack is made at advantage against a creature with lower than 12 Passive Perception.

action.name: Heavy Air {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 5 feet must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be slowed by its labored breaths for the next minute. An affected creature cannot make more than a single attack in a turn, and repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon unleashes a burst of steam, shrouding itself in a cloud that fills a 15-foot-diameter sphere centered on its space, heavily obscuring the area until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Misty Advance
entries: As a reaction to a creature targeting the myrmidon with a ranged attack, the myrmidon may teleport up to 30 ft. toward the attacker. If it ends this teleportation within 5 feet of the attacker, it may impose disadvantage on the triggering attack.

trait.name: Pull Together (1/Day)
entries: When the myrmidon is reduced to 0 hit points, it may turn to smoke and disipate instead of dying. At the beginning of its next turn, it appears within 15 feet of the space it left with 1 Hit Point.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with its Billow, if available.

action.name: Sooty Garotte
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit* 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled}. If this attack was made at advantage, it deals an additonal 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Billow (Concentration, Recharge 5-6)
entries: The myrmidon wreaths itself in a 10 ft. radius cloud of dense smoke that travels with it. The smoke spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon unleashes a burst of choking smoke. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be unable to speak or breathe for the next minute. A creature may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

reaction.name: In the Wind
entries: As a reaction to taking slashing or bludgeoning damage, the myrmidon may teleport up to 30 feet to a location it can see.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The myrmidon can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with its Sticky Lunge, if available.

action.name: Clinging Cosh
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage. This attack is made at advantage against a {@condition grappled} creature.

action.name: Sticky Lunge {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 5 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled}. While {@condition grappled} by the myrmidon in this way, the target takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) acid damage at the start of each of its turns.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon unleashes a wave of ooze. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) acid damage and be covered in acid until a creature uses its action to scrape or wash the acid off. A creature covered in the acid takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) acid damage at end of each of its turns.

reaction.name: Split
entries: When a myrmidon that is small or larger is subjected to slashing damage, it splits into two new mepits one size smaller than the original. Each new myrmidon has hit points equal to half the original myrmidon's, rounded down.

trait.name: Soluble
entries: If the myrmidon is doused in water (at least one gallon), it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or disintegrate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with its Dessicate, if available.

action.name: Saltcrusted Seax
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dessicate {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 5 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. The creature is unaffected by the next source of healing it would receive before the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon unleashes a burst of stinging salt. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage and gain vulnerability to the next source of acid damage it takes in the next minute.

reaction.name: Salt the Wound
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 5 feet of it taking 15 or more slashing damage, the myrmidon may cause it to take an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: Earthglide
entries: The myrmidon can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the myrmidon doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with its Soften Earth, if available.

action.name: Muddy Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. A creature knocked {@condition prone} in this way must spend its full movement to stand.

action.name: Soften Earth (Concentration, Recharge 5-6)
entries: The ground in a 10 ft. radius around the myrmidon becomes difficult terrain for the next minute. This radius moves with the myrmidon.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon unleashes a burst of sticky mud. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the end of the attacker's next turn.

reaction.name: Non-Newtonian
entries: As a reaction to taking bludgeoning or slashing damage, the myrmidon increases its AC by 2 until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Stoneglide
entries: The myrmidon can burrow through nonmagical stone. While doing so, the myrmidon doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with its Fool's Greed, if available.

action.name: Sparkling Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) slashing damage. This attack deals an additional 6 ({@damage 1d12}) damage to a {@condition charmed} creature.

action.name: Fool's Greed {@recharge 5}
entries: The myrmidon holds out a worthless gem. Each creature within 5 feet that can see it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the myrmidon until the end of the myrmidon's next turn, or until the creature takes damage. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature can do nothing but stare greedily at the gem.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon unleashes a burst of minerals. The attacker succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Scratchproof Facing
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a weapon attack that deals piercing damage, the myrmidon may gain a +5 bonus to AC against the triggering attack, potentially blocking it.

trait.name: Molten Body
entries: If the myrmidon takes 20 or more cold damage from a single source, it is {@condition petrified}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with its Molten fissure, if available.

action.name: Magma Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage and the target is pushed 5 ft. away.

action.name: Molten Fissure {@recharge 5}
entries: A 15 ft. long, 5 ft. wide, 5 ft. deep fissure originating from the myrmidon opens in the earth. Each creature in the area when it appears must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or fall in, taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage and falling {@condition prone}. For the next minute, a creature that starts its turn in the fissure takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon unleashes a spray of magma flecks. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage and have molten rock splashed on it. Until it or another creature takes an action to clear the rock, the creature has disadvantage on attack rolls and takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

reaction.name: Melt Weapon
entries: As a reaction to being hit with nonmagical melee weapon attack, the myrmidon melts and warps the weapon. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls.

trait.name: Electrified
entries: A creature that hits the myrmidon with a melee attack can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with its Charge Weapon, if available.

action.name: Static Longspear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit* 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) lightning damage and the target has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

action.name: Charge Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: The myrmidon charges a weapon that isn't held or carried with electricity. The next creature to touch the weapon must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) lightning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the myrmidon's following turn.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmido unleashes a burst of lightning. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage. A creature wearing metal armor makes this save at disadvantage.

reaction.name: Numbing Sparks
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the myrmidon may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Lightning damage and drop one object it is holding and be unable to pick up dropped objects until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Revealing Radiance
entries: The myrmidon sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. Creatures in the radius of bright light cannot benefit from invisibility.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with its Sunstrike, if available.

action.name: Illuminating Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) radiant damage and the next attack roll made against this target in the next minute is made at advantage.

action.name: Sunstrike {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in a 5 ft. radius centered on a point within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@dice 2d6}) fire and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage. A creature that is averting its eyes has disadvantage on this save.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon unleashes a burst of light. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. A creature that averts its eyes at the beginning of its turn succeed automatically on this save.

trait.name: Chip Away
entries: The myrmidon is encased in a brittle icy shell. When the myrmidon is reduced below its maximum hit points, its AC is reduced by 4.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with its Encase in Frost.

action.name: Chilling Hooksword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit* 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) cold damage and the target's movement speed is reduced by 5 until the end of its next turn. A creature whose movement speed is reduced to 0 in this way must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Encase in Frost {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 10 feet must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or gain 5 ({@dice 2d4}) temporary hit points. While it has these temporary hit points, the creature has vulnerability to fire damage and is {@condition restrained}.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon unleashes a burst of clinging ice. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 3d4}) cold damage and have its movement speed reduced by 20 until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Icy Gust
entries: As a reaction to a creature hitting the myrmidon with a melee attack, the myrmidon may make a melee attack against the attacker. If the attack hits, the creature is pushed back 5 feet.

trait.name: Molten Repair
entries: Whenever the myrmidon is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

trait.name: Mirror Dweller
entries: The myrmidon treats reflective objects as doorways to extradimensional spaces resembling the space reflected by them. While in a mirrored surface, the myrmidon can control what images appear reflected in it. If a mirrored surface containing a myrmidon ceases to be reflective, the myrmidon is expelled into an unoccupied adjacent space and {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with a use of its invisibility.

action.name: Razor Shard
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 14 ({@damage 4d4 + 4}) slashing damage. On a critical hit, the myrmidon may use its invibility as a bonus action this turn, if available.

action.name: Invisibility (Concentration, Recharge 5-6)
entries: The myrmidon magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon unleashes a a burst of shattered glass. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage and have glass shards embedded in its flesh. Until a creature takes an action to remove the shards, the creature's movement speed is reduced by 10.

reaction.name: Reflect
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a spell of first level or below, the myrmidon may make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the myrmidon may change the spell's target to another creature within 15 feet.

trait.name: Fire Step
entries: Surfaces the myrmidon moves over ignite and burn for 1 minute. A creature that starts its turn in a burning area, or enters it for the first time on a turn, takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Wind-Whipped
entries: Attacks of opportunity against the myrmidon are made at disadvantage. If an attack of opportunity misses it, the attacker is pulled 5 feet towards the myrmidon.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with its Burning Steel, if available.

action.name: Molten Lash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit* 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. If the target is wearing metal armor, it takes an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Burning Steel {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in a 15 ft. cone that is wielding a metal weapon takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) damage and must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or drop its weapon in an adjacent space.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon unleashes a burst of fire. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or catch fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Earthen Form
entries: If the myrmidon is doused in water (at least one gallon), it loses its damage resistances until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with its Earthbreak, if available.

action.name: Chained Hammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. *Hit* 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 5 ft. away. This attack deals an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage to a {@condition prone} creature.

action.name: Earthbreak {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in a 15 foot cone must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d12}) bludgeoning damage and fall {@condition prone}, or half as much damage on a success. The affected area becomes difficult terrain.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon sends forth a burst of earth. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone} and unable to stand this turn.

trait.name: Weightless
entries: Whenever the myrmidon takes damage, it is pushed 10 feet away from the source of the damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with a use of its Clinging Dust, if available.

action.name: Sweeping Stiletto
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 14 ({@damage 4d4 + 4}) slashing damage. If this attack is made at advantage, it deals an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage.

action.name: Clinging Dust {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 10 feet must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be outlined in pale, clinging dust. Until a creature takes an action to clear it, attacks against the affected creature are made at advantage, and the affected creature or object can't benefit from being {@condition invisible}.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon unleashes a burst of dust. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the Myrmiddon's next turn. If the myrmidon is doused in water (at least one gallon), this trait ceases to function for the next minute.

reaction.name: Explosive
entries: As a reaction to taking fire damage, the dust myrmidon may force each creature within 10 feet to succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or half as much damage on a success.

trait.name: Weightless
entries: Whenever the myrmidon takes damage, it is pushed 10 feet away from the source of the damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with its

action.name: Ashwake Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) fire damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be unable speak or breathe until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Ember Gout {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 10 feet must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or catch fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon unleashes burst of ash. The attacker succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) fire damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Weightless
entries: Whenever the myrmidon takes damage, it is pushed 10 feet away from the source of the damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with a use of its Updraft, if available.

action.name: Iron War Fan
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. *Hit* 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning or slashing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away. This attack has advantage against a levitating or flying creature.

action.name: Updraft {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 5 feet must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be levitated 5 ft. off the ground for the next minute. A creature may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon unleashes a burst of air. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Current-Dancer
entries: As a reaction to a creature being pushed out of its range, the myrmidon may move up to 15 ft. towards the creature and make a melee attack against it.

trait.name: Water Form
entries: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Freeze
entries: If the elemental takes 10 or more cold damage in a turn, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 feet and it loses its resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks, one of which it may replace with a use of its Whelm.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If this attack targets a creature {@condition restrained} in the elemental's space, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} constitution saving throw or lose its held breath and begin to suffocate.

action.name: Whelm
entries: One creature in the elemental's space must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space. A creature may take an action to make a {@dc 14} Strength (Athletics) check to remove itself or another creature from the elemental.

reaction.name: Crashing Wave
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the elemental can move into the attackers space and use it's Whelm ability.

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 feet.

trait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 5 feet the elemental moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

action.name: Stoke
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) fire damage. If the target on fire, it takes an additional 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Backdraft
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack by a creature more than 10 feet away, the elemental lets loose an explosion of flame. Each creature within 10 feet must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage and be pushed 5 feet away. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is also knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Flashover (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 52 HP, the fire elemental ignites each creature and flamable object within 30 feet of it. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature that is already on fire instead takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Earthen Form
entries: If the elemental is doused in water (at least one gallon), it loses its damage resistances until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Shatter Earth {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in a 30 foot cone must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 19 ({@damage 3d12}) bludgeoning damage and fall {@condition prone}, or half as much damage on a success. The affected area becomes difficult terrain.

trait.name: Air Form
entries: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Updraft
entries: A creature that starts its turn sharing a space with the elemental must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constutiton saving throw or be levitated 5 feet off the ground until the start of its next turn, or until it leaves the elemental's space. While levitating in this way, the creature moves with the elemental when it moves.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. This attack is made at advantage against a levitating or flying creature.

action.name: Whirlwind {@recharge 4}
entries: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 15 ({@damage 3d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage and is flung up 20 feet away from the elemental in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes an object, such as a wall or floor, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.
If the saving throw is successful, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't flung away or knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Eject
entries: As a reaction to being hit by a creature levitating in its space, the elemental may move up to half its speed, then eject the attacker into an adjacence space of the elemental's choice.

trait.name: Freeze
entries: Whenever the mephit takes cold damage, its speed is reduced by 10 and it gains vulnerability to bludgeoning damage until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a wave of crashing water. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Watery Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, the mephit can grapple the target (escape {@dc 12}).. This attack has advantage against a creature submerged in water.

action.name: Drench {@recharge}
entries: The mephit spews a stream of cold water in a 15 foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. If this damage causes a creature to make a concentration check, it makes it at disadvantage.

reaction.name: Crashing Wave
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the mephit can make a melee attack. If the attack hits, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Weightless
entries: Whenever the mephit takes damage, it is pushed 10 feet away from the source of the damage.

trait.name: Void Aura
entries: A creature within 5 feet of the mephit cannot speak or breathe.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it implodes. Each creature within 15 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Thunder damage and be pulled 10 feet towards the mephit.

action.name: Dragging Winds
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit* 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or be pulled 10 feet towards the mephit. This attack has advantage against a levitating or flying creature.

action.name: Cavitate (Concentration, Recharge 6)
entries: For the next minute, the mephit is surrounded by sucking winds. A creature that start its turn within 5 feet of the mephit must succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or be unable to move away from it until the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Vaccuum Channel
entries: As a reaction to an allied creature within 15 feet being targeted with an attack, the mephit may pull the allied creature 10 feet closer. If the allied creature ends this movement out of range of the triggering attack, the attack misses.

trait.name: Weightless
entries: Whenever the mephit takes damage, it is pushed 10 feet away from the source of the damage.

trait.name: Condense
entries: If the steam mephit takes cold damage, it is reduced to size Tiny and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of steam, leaving behind a cloud that fills a 15-foot-diameter sphere centered on its space. The sphere is heavily obscured. Wind disperses the cloud, which otherwise lasts for 1 minute.

action.name: Hazy Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit* 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away. This attack is made at advantage against a creature with lower than 12 Passive Perception.

action.name: Heavy Air {@recharge}
entries: One creature within 5 feet must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be slowed by its labored breaths for the next minute. An affected creature cannot make more than a single attack in a turn, and repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

reaction.name: Misty Advance
entries: As a reaction to a creature targeting the mephit with a ranged attack, the mephit may teleport up to thirty feet toward the attacker. If it ends this teleportation within 5 feet of the attacker, it may impose disadvantage on the triggering attack.

trait.name: Pull Together (1/Day)
entries: When the mephit is reduced to 0 HP, it may turn to smoke and disipate instead of dying. At the beginning of its next turn, it appears within 15 feet of the space it left with 1 Hit Point.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of choking smoke. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 9} Constitution saving throw or be unable to speak or breathe for the next minute. A creature may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit* 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If this attack was made at advantage, it deals an additional 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage.

action.name: Billow (Concentration, Recharge 6)
entries: The mephit wreaths itself in a 10 ft. radius cloud of dense smoke that travels with it. The smoke spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured.

reaction.name: In the Wind
entries: As a reaction to taking slashing or bludgeoning damage, the mephit may teleport up to 30 feet to a location it can see.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The mephit can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a wave of ooze. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) acid damage and be covered in acid until a creature uses its action to scrape or wash the acid off itself or another creature. A creature covered in the acid takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) acid damage at end of each of its turns.

action.name: Sticky Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage. This attack is made at advantage against a {@condition grappled} creature.

reaction.name: Stick (Recharge 6)
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack by a Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet, the mephit forces the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled}. While {@condition grappled} by the mephit in this way, the target takes {@damage 2d4} acid damage at the start of each of its turns.

reaction.name: Split
entries: When a mephit that is small or larger is subjected to slashing damage, it splits into two new tiny mepits. Each new mephit has hit points equal to half the original mephit's, rounded down.

trait.name: Soluble
entries: If the mephit is doused in water (at least one gallon), it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or disintegrate.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of salt. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage and gain vulnerability to the next source of acid damage it would take.

action.name: Salt Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dessicate {@recharge}
entries: One creature within 5 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. The creature is unaffected by the next source of healing it would receive before the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Salt the Wound
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 5 feet of it taking 5 or more slashing damage, the mephit may cause it to take an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: Earthglide
entries: The mephit can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the mephit doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of sticky mud. Each Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the end of the creature's next turn.

action.name: Muddy Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and the target must make a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. A creature knocked {@condition prone} in this way must spend its full movement to stand.

action.name: Soften Earth (Concentration, Recharge 6)
entries: The ground in a 10 ft. radius around the mephit becomes difficult terrain for the next minute. This radius moves with the mephit.

reaction.name: Non-Newtonian
entries: As a reaction to taking bludgeoning or slashing damage, the mephit increases its AC by 2 until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Stoneglide
entries: The mephit can burrow through nonmagical stone. While doing so, the mephit doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of minerals. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Sparkling Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage. This attack deals an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage to a {@condition charmed} creature.

action.name: Fool's Greed {@recharge}
entries: The mephit holds out a worthless gem. Each creature within 5 feet that can see it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the mephit until the end of the mephit's next turn, or until the creature takes damage. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature can do nothing but stare greedily at the gem.

reaction.name: Scratchproof Facing
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a weapon attack that deals piercing damage, the mephit may gain a +5 bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

trait.name: Molten Body
entries: If the mephit takes 10 or more cold damage from a single source, it is {@condition petrified}.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of magma. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage and have molten rock splashed on it. Until it or another creature takes an action to clear the rock, the creature has disadvantage on attack rolls and takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Magma Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage. The target must then succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be pushed 5 feet away.

action.name: Molten Fissure {@recharge}
entries: A 15 ft. long, 5 ft. wide, 5 ft. deep fissure originating from the mephit opens in the earth. Each creature in the area when it appears must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or fall in, taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage and falling {@condition prone}. For the next minute, a creature that starts its turn in the fissure takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Melt Weapon
entries: As a reaction to being hit with nonmagical melee weapon attack, the mephit melts and warps the weapon. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls.

trait.name: Electrified
entries: A creature that hits the mephit with a melee attack can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of lightning. Each creature within 10 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage. A creature wearing metal armor makes this save at disadvantage.

action.name: Static Shock
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) lightning damage and the target has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

action.name: Charge Weapon {@recharge}
entries: The mephit charges a weapon that isn't held or carried with electricity. The next creature to touch the weapon must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the mephit's following turn.

reaction.name: Numbing Sparks
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the mephit may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Lightning damage and drop whatever it is holding and be unable to pick up dropped objects until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Revealing Radiance
entries: The mephit sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. Creatures in the radius of bright light cannot benefit from invisibility.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of light. Each creature within 15 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) radiant damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. A creature that averts its eyes at the beginning of its turn succeed automatically on this save.

action.name: Illuminating Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) radiant damage and the next attack roll made against this target in the next minute is made at advantage.

action.name: Sunstrike
entries: Each creature in a 5 ft. radius centered on a point within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 3 ({@dice 1d6}) fire and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) radiant damage. A creature that is averting its eyes has disadvantage on this save.

reaction.name: Dazzling Flash
entries: As a reaction to a creature hitting the mephit with a melee attack, the mephit may emit a bright flash, dazzling the creature. Until the end of the mephit's next turn, the attacker treats the mephit as {@condition invisible}.

trait.name: Chip Away
entries: The mephit is encased in a brittle icy shell. When the mephit is reduced below its maximum hit points, its AC is reduced by 4.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of ice. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 9} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 3d4}) cold damage and have its movement speed reduced by 20 until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Chilling Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit* 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) cold damage and the target's movement speed is reduced by 10 until the end of its next turn. A creature whose movement speed is reduced to 0 in this way must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Encase in Frost {@recharge}
entries: One creature within 5 feet must succeed on a {@dc 9} Strength saving throw or gain 5 ({@dice 2d4}) temporary hit points. While it has these temporary hit points, the creature has vulnerability to fire damage and is {@condition restrained}.

reaction.name: Icy Gust
entries: As a reaction to a creature hitting the mephit with a melee attack, the mephit may make a melee attack against the attacker. If the attack hits, the creature is pushed back 5 feet.
