trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The toad can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The toad's long jump is up to 10 ft. and its high jump is up to 5 ft., with or without a running start.

trait.name: Poisonous
entries: A creature that hits the toad with a melee attack using Natural Weapons takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) poison damage. If this damage reduces the toad to 0 hit points, the attacker must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the toad can't bite another target.

action.name: Tongue
entries: One Large or smaller creature within 20 ft must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 15 ft towards the toad, which can use a bonus action to make a bite attack against it.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The toad makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the frog, and it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the frog's turns. The frog can have only one target swallowed at a time. If the frog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The axe beak has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the axe beak's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Burst of Speed {@recharge}
entries: The axe beak may dash as a bonus action.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage. This attack deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage to a {@condition prone} target.

action.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Treasure Sense
entries: The aurumvorax can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 ft. of it.

trait.name: Ornery
entries: The aurumvorax does not die or fall {@condition unconscious} due to dropping to 0 HP if it was attacked by a hostile creature since the end of its previous turn. If the badger starts its turn with 0 HP without having been attacked since the end of its previous turn, it dies.

trait.name: Incredible Density
entries: The aurumvorax has advantage on attempts to shove creatures, and on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would shove it or knock it {@condition prone}. The aurumvorax may grapple or shove creatures up to three sizes larger than it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aurumvorax makes five attacks: one with its locking jaws and four with its scrabbling claws. It may replace any of its claw attacks with a Shove attempt.

action.name: Locking Jaws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition grappled}. Until this grapple ends, the aurumvorax can bite only
the {@condition grappled} creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

action.name: Scrabbling Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage. If this attack is made at advantage, it does an additional 2 ({@damage 1d4}) damage.

variant.name: Note: Treasure Beasts
entries: The corpse of an aurumvorax contains roughly 150-200 lbs of gold that may be smelted from it, for a total value of 3,000-4,000 gp. Its hide can be used as a component in crafting Armor of Fire Resistance.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the ape can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Juggernaut Leap
entries: The ape's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet when it has a running start. If the ape jumps at least 20 feet, it may land in the space of any large or smaller creature. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, is instead pushed 5 feet out of the ape's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ape makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) piercing damage. This attack deals an additional 21 ({@damage 6d6}) damage to a {@condition grappled} creature.

action.name: Hurl
entries: The ape hurls a huge or smaller {@condition grappled} creature up to 40 feet. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 50/100 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 7d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the ape can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Juggernaut Leap
entries: The ape's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet when it has a running start. If the ape jumps at least 20 feet, it may land in the space of any medium or smaller creature. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, is instead pushed 5 feet out of the ape's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ape makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage. This attack deals an additional 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage to a {@condition grappled} creature.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 25/50 ft., one target. {@h}({@dice 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The uvuudaum has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The uvuudaum can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Non-Euclidian
entries: The space in a 10 foot radius around the uvuudaum is difficult terrain, as the uvuudaum's presence warps it into incomprehensible geometries.

trait.name: Four Dimensional
entries: Time does not seem to pass during the Uvuudaum's turn. It does not provoke attacks of opportunity, and its melee attacks are made at advantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The uvuudaum makes three attacks with its head spike.

action.name: Head Spike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) piercing damage and the target has its Wisdom score reduced by {@dice 1d6}, to a minimum of 1. If this reduces the target below 10 Wisdom, the target suffers one additional effect of the uvuudaum's choice. The uvuudaum may not choose the same effect twice in a turn:

items.name: Amnesia
entries: The target loses a chunk of memory, reducing its proficiency bonus by 1 for the next minute.

items.name: Anoxia
entries: If the target cast a spell since the end of the uvuudaum's previous turn, it loses the ability to cast that spell until it completes a long rest.

items.name: Apnea
entries: The target forgets how to breathe. At the end of each of its turns, it may make a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw, remembering how to breathe on a success.

items.name: Mania
entries: On the target's next turn, it may make one melee attack as a bonus action, but its targets are selected at random from those it can reach with its movement.

items.name: Paranoia
entries: The target becomes {@condition frightened} of one of its allies until the end of its next turn. While {@condition frightened} in this way, it cannot willingly accept assistance from that ally.

items.name: Seizure
entries: If the target casts a spell on its following turn, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition prone} and end its turn.

reaction.name: Ruin Mind
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 15 ft. hitting it with an attack, the uvuudaum uses its multiattack, targeting the attacker with each attack.

reaction.name: Scuttle
entries: As a reaction to being forced to make a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, the uvuudaum moves up to half of its speed. If this movement puts the uvuudaum out of range or area of the spell or magical effect, the uvuudaum is unaffected.

reaction.name: Psychic Storm
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 115 hit points, the uvuudaum lets out a telepathic shriek. Each creature within 60 ft. that has a Wisdom score of 1 is {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Adamantine Shell
entries: The spirrax has a shell of pure adamantine that protects it from most harm. If it has fewer than 163 hit points, the spirrax cannot use its fly speed while encased in its shell and attacks against it are made at advantage while encased in its shell. While encased in its shell, the spirrax has the following traits:

items.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: The spirrax can't be affected or detected by spells of 3rd level or lower. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

items.name: Critical Immunity
entries: Any critical hit against the spirax becomes a normal hit.

items.name: Increased AC
entries: The spirrax gains +6 to its AC (included).

items.name: Impenetrable Flank
entries: A creature receives no benefit from flanking the spirrax.

items.name: Constrained
entries: The spirrax makes four fewer attacks with its multiattack.

trait.name: Aura of Indifference
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 120 ft. of the spirrax must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become indifferent to the spirrax's presence until the beginning of its next turn. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more retains no memory of the affected period after the spirrax leaves.

trait.name: Implosion
entries: When the spirrax dies, the dimensional gate contained within it implodes. Each creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be sucked in and transported to a random plane. A creature that succeeds on this save may use its reaction to repeat the save to rescue a creature that failed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spirrax makes two attacks with its lashing tendrils, or makes six attacks and takes the Dash action if it is out of its shell.

action.name: Lashing Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Instead of grappling a creature, the spirrax may force it to succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 ft. away and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Fling
entries: One Large or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the spirax is thrown up to 60 feet and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Void Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature, object or creation of magical force within 60 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 75 ({@damage 10d6 + 40}) force damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, it is disintegrated.

reaction.name: Foul Emergance (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to taking damage while below 163 hit points, the spirax surges out of its shell in a tide of whirling tentacles. As part of this reaction, the spirrax may move up to its speed and use its multiattack. Each creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the spirax's next turn.

variant.name: Note: Adamantine Shell
entries: The shell of a spirrax contains roughly 16,000 gp worth of adamantine.

trait.name: Cold Blooded
entries: If the tzakandi takes cold damage, it cannot make more than one attack on its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The tzakandi has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tzakandi makes three attacks, one of which may be with its tentacles.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) psychic damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}).

action.name: Hooked Pike
entries: Ближний бой: {@hit 4} попадание, досягаемость 10 футов, одна цель. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) косых повреждений. Если цель верхом, ее стаскивают с лошади и наносят дополнительно 3 ({@damage 1d6}) колющего урона.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition incapacitated} humanoid {@condition grappled} by the tzakandi. {@h}The target takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the tzakandi kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Haywire Spit {@recharge 5}
entries: The tzakandi spits a globule of psychoactive acid. One creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the tzakandi's next turn.

reaction.name: Telekinetic Outburst
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 49 hit points, the tzakandi lashes out telekinetically. Each creature within 20 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The slaad can use its action to polymorph itself or another slaad into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Chaotic Resilience
entries: The slaad has resistance to the damage type of the last source of damage it received.

trait.name: Mighty Leap
entries: The slaad can leap its full movement without a running start. If the slaad jumps at least 20 feet, it may land in the space of any medium or smaller creature. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet out of the slaad's space.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite, and two with its claws. It may replace its bite attack with a use of its Uncontrolled Burst or Madness Croak, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Pandemoniac Ideal (Concentration)
entries: The slaad creates the image of an object or creature no larger than a 20-foot cube. It seems real to all senses, though a successful {@dc 15} Intelligence (Investigation) check reveals its illusory nature. The slaad may interact with the illusion physically as though it were real.

action.name: Madness Croak
entries: Each creature (including the slaad) in a 30 ft. radius must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be forced to use its reaction to make a melee attack against a radom creature in range. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Uncontrolled Burst {@recharge 5}
entries: Each other creature within 20 feet must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) force damage and be pushed 15 feet away, or half as much damage on a success.

action.name: Plane Shift (1/Day)
entries: The slaad and any number of slaadi adjacent to it teleport to a different plane of existence.

reaction.name: Lose Cohesion
entries: As a reaction to taking 15 or more damage from a single source, the slaad may disintegrate into a shower of fine particles, reforming at any point within 10 ft. at the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The slaad can use its action to polymorph itself or another slaad into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Chaotic Resilience
entries: The slaad has resistance to the damage type of the last source of damage it received.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite, and two with its claws. It may replace its bite attack with a use of its Uncontrolled Burst or Madness Croak, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) колющего урона.

action.name: Claw

action.name: Madness Croak

A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Uncontrolled Burst {@recharge 5}
entries: Each other creature within 20 feet must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage, or half as much on a success.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Chaotic Resilience
entries: The slaad has resistance to the damage type of the last source of damage it received.

trait.name: Disordered Transposition
entries: At the beginning of the slaad's turn, a randomly selected creature is teleported up to 30 feet to a location of the slaad's choice.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws or staff. Alternatively, it uses its Hurl Flame twice.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) колющего урона.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. The fire ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried.

action.name: Pandemoniac Ideal (Concentration)
entries: The slaad creates the image of an object or creature no larger than a 20-foot cube. It seems real to all senses, though a successful {@dc 15} Intelligence (Investigation) check reveals its illusory nature. The slaad may interact with the illusion physically as though it were real.

A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Wall Lurker
entries: The slaad may pass through wood, plaster, or stone walls without resistance.

trait.name: Ambitious
entries: The slaad has advantage on attacks that target creatures with 14 or more hit dice

trait.name: Chaotic Resilience
entries: The slaad has resistance to the damage type of the last source of damage it received.

trait.name: Mighty Leap
entries: The slaad can leap its full movement without a running start. If the slaad jumps at least 20 feet, it may land in the space of any medium or smaller creature. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet out of the slaad's space.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The slaad makes three attacks, one of which may be a bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be infected with a disease called {@disease chaos phage|ConfC}.

action.name: Rending Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage. This attack scores a critical hit on a roll of 18-20.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Chaotic Resilience
entries: The slaad has resistance to the damage type of the last source of damage it received.

trait.name: Mighty Leap
entries: The slaad can leap its full movement without a running start. If the slaad jumps at least 20 feet, it may land in the space of any medium or smaller creature. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet out of the slaad's space

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The slaad makes three attacks, only one of which may be a bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Vicious Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage. This attack deals an additional 5 ({@damage 2d4}) damage to a {@condition prone} creature.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC: 14 Constitution saving throw or be infected with a disease - a minuscule {@disease slaad egg|ConfC}.

monster.name: Phaerimm
languages: understands Common but can't speak it

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The phaerimm has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Dessicating Dweomer
entries: A creature that fails a saving throw against a spell or magical effect of the phaerimm's has any potions or other liquids it is carrying dry up, becoming unusable until rehydrated.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The phaerimm makes five attacks, one of which may be with its bite or its stinger.

action.name: Grinding Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition grappled} target. {@h}46 ({@damage 8d10 + 2}) piercing damage. A creature killed by this damage has its corpse utterly destroyed.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.  Instead of dealing damage, the phaerimm can grapple the target (escape {@dc 14}).

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d8 + 2}) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for the next minute. A {@condition poisoned} creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Implant Egg
entries: The phaerimm makes a stinger attack against a {@condition poisoned} creature. If the attack hits, the phaerimm deposits an egg in the wound. The creature is {@condition paralyzed} and levitates 3 ft. off the ground until a creature makes a {@dc 17} Wisdom (Medicine) check to remove the egg, or until the egg hatches in {@dice 2d20} hours, killing the host. Each attempt (successful or not) deals {@dice 1d4} points of damage to the host.

reaction.name: Absorbption
entries: As a reaction to succeeding on a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, the phaerimm gains temporary hit points equal to 10 times the level of the spell.

reaction.name: Reflection
entries: As a reaction to succeeding on a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, the phaerimm changes the spell's target to a creature of its choice that it can see within 30 ft.

legendary.name: Tortuous Compulsion (4th level spell)
entries: One creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage. A creature that takes 10 or more psychic damage in this way acts under the phaerimm's control on its following turn.

legendary.name: Wrack (2nd level spell)
entries: One creature within 60 ft. is overwhelmed with indescribable pain. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition prone} and be unable to stand on its following turn. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more subtracts {@dice 1d4} from attacks and saving throws it makes for the next minute.

legendary.name: Wretched Drowning (4th level spell, Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Blood wells up in the mouth and lungs of a creature, suffocating it. One creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage and be unable to speak or breathe for the next minute. An affected creature repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 feet of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

trait.name: Spying Eye
entries: The otyugh has advantage on checks made to hide while submerged in flith.

trait.name: Horrid Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the Otyugh must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the otyugh's stench for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The otyugh makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its tentacles.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or contract {@disease filth fever|ConfC}.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}) and {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The otyugh has two tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Tentacle Slam
entries: The otyugh slams creatures {@condition grappled} by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the otyugh's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The nothic has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Weirding Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see the nothic's eye starts its turn within 30 feet of the nothic, the nothic can force it to make a {@dc 12} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the nothic magically learns one fact or secret about the target. The target automatically succeeds if it is immune to being {@condition charmed}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nothic makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tempt With Knowledge
entries: The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 feet that has been affected by its weirding gaze. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Intelligence saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage. A creature that fails this save voluntarily is additionally {@condition stunned} for the next minute, and learns a 1st level wizard spell of the nothic's choice, which it may cast once per long rest without expending a spell slot. The creature may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the stun effect on a success.

variant.name: Note: Temptations
entries: The following spells are likely to get your players to accept the Nothic's bargain: {@spell Absorb Elements|XGE}, {@spell Charm Person}, {@spell Comprehend Languages}, {@spell Disguise Self}, {@spell Feather Fall}, {@spell Mage Armor}, {@spell Magic Missile}, {@spell Shield}.

Be careful giving access to Shield to your players. It's fine on a character with armor, and it's fine on a character with more spell slots to cast it more than once per day, but as a general rule you shouldn't give it to a character with both.
Alternately, you can offer some bit of plot or character-relevant knowledge. With it's weirding gaze, the nothic has an excuse to know just about any sort of secret.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The mind flayer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Non-Euclidian
entries: The space in a 5 foot radius around the mind flayer is difficult terrain, as the mind flayer's presence warps it into incomprehensible geometries.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) and must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition incapacitated} humanoid {@condition grappled} by the mind flayer. {@h}The target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Dominate (Concentration)
entries: 30 ft. range, targets 1 creature the mind flayer can see. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom Saving Throw or be magically {@condition charmed} and under the mind flayer's control. The {@condition charmed} creature can't take reactions, and the mind flayer and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance. Whenever the {@condition charmed} target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Enthralling Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The mind flayer magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. If a creature fails this save by 5 or more, it is instead placed under the mind flayer's control, per the dominate ability. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Break Will
entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by the mind flayer must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom Saving Throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage and have its Wisdom score reduced by the same amount, to a minimum of 1. If this reduces the {@condition charmed} creature to 1 Wisdom, the mind flayer no longer requires Concentration to Dominate it. This reduction lasts until the creature completes a short or long rest.

action.name: Plane Shift (1/Day)
entries: The mind flayer teleports to another plane of existence.

reaction.name: Die For Your Master
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with an attack or spell, the Mind Flayer may force a {@condition charmed} creature within 15 feet to make a {@dc 15} Dexterity Saving Throw. On a success, the creature moves up to half its speed toward the mind flayer, becoming the new target of the attack or spell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The mind flayer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Non-Euclidian
entries: The space in a 5 foot radius around the mind flayer is difficult terrain, as the mind flayer's presence warps it into incomprehensible geometries.

trait.name: Stalker of the Senseless
entries: The mindflayer is {@condition invisible} to creatures without proficiency in Perception. It uses its Intelligence modifier for Stealth checks, rather than Dexterity, and can attempt to hide without being obscured.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) and must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

The {@condition charmed} creature can't take reactions, and the mind flayer and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance. action.name: Plane Shift (1/Day)

reaction.name: Telekinetic Shove
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the Mind Flayer may force the attacker to make a {@dc 15} Strength Saving Throw. on a failure, the creature is pushed 15 feet away from the mind flayer.

monster.name: Intellect Devourer
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

trait.name: Mindsense
entries: The intellect devourer is aware of the presence of creatures within 300 feet of it that have an Intelligence of 3 or higher. It knows the relative distance and direction of each creature, regardless of physical barriers. Creatures under the effects of magic that protects the mind cannot be detected by the intellect devourer.

trait.name: Exposed Brain
entries: The intellect devourer has a telepathic field that grants it resistace to all damage but psychic, which it must concentrate on as though concentrating on a spell. If it loses concentration, until the beginning of its next turn it loses its damage resistances and gains vulnerability to all damage but psychic.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The intellect devourer can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide.

action.name: Trepanation Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage. This attack deals an additional 21 ({@damage 6d6}) damage to an {@condition incapacitated} target and bores a small hole in its skull.

action.name: Rend Mind
entries: The intellect devourer chooses one creature it can see within 30 feet of it that has an Intelligence of 3 or higher The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, its Intelligence score is reduced to 0 and it is {@condition stunned}. The target may repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Displace Brain
entries: One creature within 5 feet must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition grappled} and {@condition blinded} as the intellect devourer latches onto a hole bored by its trepanation claws. At the beginning of the intellect devourer's next turn, it forces its way into the creature's skull, consumes and displaces the creature's brain, and takes full control of its body. While inside the creature's skull, the intellect devourer has total cover against attacks and other effects outside of the host. The intellect devourer retains its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as its comprehension of language, its telepathy, and its traits. Otherwise, it inherits the target's statistics, memories and knowledge, including spells and languages. If the host body drops to 0 hit points, the intellect devourer must leave the host. It can also be magically forced from the host's body by means of a {@spell protection from evil and good} spell being cast on the host.

reaction.name: Scuttle
entries: As a reaction to being subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, the intellect devourer may move up to half its speed. If it ends this movement outside the effect's area, range, or line-of-sight, the intellect devourer takes no damage.

trait.name: Oppressive Telepathy
entries: A conscious creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the grell must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or use its reaction to make a melee attack against a creature in range of the grell's choice. A creature that succeeds on this save by 5 or more becomes {@condition invisible} to the grell until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The grell makes two attacks with its tentacles. If the grell has a creature {@condition grappled}, it may replace one of these with a beak attack.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage, the target is {@condition grappled}, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The {@condition poisoned} target is {@condition paralyzed}, and it can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one  target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Psychic Storm
entries: The grell creates an 10 foot radius area of psychic instability within range that lasts for 1 minute. A creature in the area moves in a random direction for each 5 feet of movement they attempt. Creatures in the area are immune to the grell's oppressive telepathy.

trait.name: Intrusive Telepathy
entries: A conscious creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the grell must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or take {@damage 1d4} psychic damage. A creature that succeeds on this save by 5 or more becomes {@condition invisible} to the grell until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The grell makes two attacks with its tentacles. If the grell has a creature {@condition grappled}, it may replace one of these with a beak attack.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage, the target is {@condition grappled}, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The {@condition poisoned} target is {@condition paralyzed}, and it can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one  target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: Aberrant Ground
entries: The ground in a 10-foot radius around the mouther is doughlike difficult terrain. Each creature that starts its turn in that area must succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn. A creature in this area rolls Charisma and Wisdom saves at disadvantage.

trait.name: Gibbering
entries: The mouther babbles incoherently while it can see any creature and isn't {@condition incapacitated}. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the mouther and can hear the gibbering must succeed on a {@dc 8} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a {@dice d8} to determine what it does during its turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action or bonus action and uses all its movement to move in a randomly determined direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can't make such an attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gibbering mouther makes one bite attack and, if it can, uses its Blinding Spittle. It may replace its bite attack with its Gibbering Feast ability.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}17 ({@damage 5d6}) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is killed by this damage, it is absorbed into the mouther.

action.name: Gibbering Feast
entries: One creature the mouther can see within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 8} Charisma saving throw or take {@damage 5d6} piercing damage as unnatural mouths appear on their body and bite them, after which they fall off and rot away immediately.

action.name: Blinding Spittle {@recharge 5}
entries: The mouther spits a chemical glob at a point it can see within 15 feet of it. The glob explodes in a blinding flash of light on impact. Each creature within 5 feet of the flash must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the mouther's next turn.

reaction.name: Desperate Shrieking
entries: As a reaction to taking damage, the mouther lets out a human-sounding cry of pain. The next attack against it is made with disadvantage.

trait.name: Advanced Telepathy
entries: The flumph can perceive the content of any telepathic communication used within 60 feet of it, and it can't be surprised by creatures with any form of telepathy. It is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as all divination spells.

trait.name: Prone Deficiency
entries: If the flumph is knocked {@condition prone}, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated}. At the end of each of its turns, the flumph can repeat this save, righting itself and ending the {@condition incapacitated} condition if it succeeds.

trait.name: Indifferent Aura
entries: A creature that attempts to look at the flump must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be compelled to avert its gaze. A creature that fails this save becomes indifferent to the flumph's presence for the next minute, and retains no memory of the actions the flumph takes while the creature is affected.

action.name: Spiny Drop
entries: One creature that the Flumph is flying over must make a {@dc 10} Constitution save or be {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature that passes this save by 5 or more knocks the flumph {@condition prone} in an adjacent space. A {@condition poisoned} creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Stench Spray (1/Day)
entries: Each creature in a 15-foot cone originating from the flumph must succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw or be coated in a foul-smelling liquid. A coated creature exudes a horrible stench for {@dice 1d4} hours. The coated creature is {@condition poisoned} as long as the stench lasts, and other creatures are {@condition poisoned} while within 5 feet of the coated creature. A creature can remove the stench on itself by using a short rest to bathe in water, alcohol, or vinegar.

trait.name: Advanced Telepathy
entries: The flumph can perceive the content of any telepathic communication used within 60 feet of it, and it can't be surprised by creatures with any form of telepathy. It is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as all divination spells.

trait.name: Prone Deficiency
entries: If the flumph is knocked {@condition prone}, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated}. At the end of each of its turns, the flumph can repeat this save, righting itself and ending the {@condition incapacitated} condition if it succeeds.

trait.name: Peaceful Aura
entries: A creature that attempts to harm the flump must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by it for the next minute.

action.name: Blissful Apathy {@recharge}
entries: Each creature of the flumph's choice within 30 feet must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition charmed} and {@condition incapacitated} for the next minute.

action.name: Stench Spray (1/Day)
entries: Each creature in a 15-foot cone originating from the flumph must succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw or be coated in a foul-smelling liquid. A coated creature exudes a horrible stench for {@dice 1d4} hours. The coated creature is {@condition poisoned} as long as the stench lasts, and other creatures are {@condition poisoned} while within 5 feet of the coated creature. A creature can remove the stench on itself by using a short rest to bathe in water, alcohol, or vinegar.

trait.name: Aura of Terror
entries: A sleeping creature that starts its turn within 60 ft. of the feyr is accosted by its deepest fears, and takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage. This damage does not wake a sleeping creature. A creature reduced to 0 hit points in this way gains 1 hit point and rises on its turn under the feyr's control.
A creature under the feyr's control makes a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a succeess.

trait.name: Gargantuan Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the feyr may spend half of its movement to attempt a {@dc 18} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the feyr. While climbing on the feyr, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the feyr, and the feyr has disadvantage on melee attacks against it.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While the feyr is illuminated with bright light, attacks against the it are made at advantage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the feyr fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The feyr makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with The First Unknown, if available.

action.name: Gnashing Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage. This attack deals an additional 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psyschic damage to a {@condition frightened} creature.

action.name: Tendril Lash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d6 + 8}) slashing damage. Each creature within 5 ft of the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage.

action.name: Scything Sweep
entries: Each creature in a 30 ft. cone must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 39 ({@damage 6d12}) slashing damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or half as much on a success.

action.name: Torment Gaze
entries: Each creature in a 300 ft. long, 5 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away and take 66 ({@damage 12d10}) psychic damage, or take half as much damage on as success. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more falls asleep for the next minute, additionally.
A creature wakes up early if it takes damage or another creature uses its action to wake it.

action.name: The First Unknown {@recharge 5}
entries: The feyr creates a 10-ft radius sphere of magical darkness that lasts until the end of its next turn. Creatures in the affected areas must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the darkness is dispelled. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature is {@condition paralyzed}.

reaction.name: Insubstantiate
entries: As a reaction to taking 20 or more damage from a single source, the feyr disappears into the border ethereal and loses one of its legendary resistances if it has any. At the begining of its its next turn, the feyr teleports back into the material plane within 30 ft. of where it departed.

reaction.name: Deepest Dark (1/Day.)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 211 hit points, the feyr immediately recharges and uses The First Unknown three times.

legendary.name: Eye of Taking (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The feyr ends one magical effect on a creature it can see. If the effect did not require concentration, the feyr may replicate the effect, targeting itself.

legendary.name: Eye of Keeping
entries: One creature under the Feyr's control gains 14 ({@dice 4d6}) temporary hit points. While it has these temporary hit points, a creature has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws.

legendary.name: Eye of Revelation
entries: One creature within 60 ft. that the feyr can see must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target has disadvantage on the next Wisdom saving throw it makes in the next minute.

legendary.name: To Ashes
entries: The feyr fouls the magic around a creature. The next time in the next turn that the creature would receive magical healing, the creature receives no healing and instead takes an equal amount of necrotic damage.
